loan.use: to buy some items for her shop

loan.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is 41 years old. She is a widow with 5 children, ages between 2 and 23 years. One child goes to school.
Beatrice sells beans and bananas and has done so for the last 3 years. She wants the loan to buy more beans and bananas to sell. With the profits she will manage to build her house to reside in.

loan.use: to buy more beans and bananas for sale

loan.name: Clotilde

texts.en:
Clotilde, 27, is married with two children; none of them go to school because they are still young.
Clotilde owns a bar, which she has started recently and she hopes to be the very best business in the future. She has requested the loan to buy more beers to sell. With the profits from the business, she plans to expand her business.

loan.use: To buy more beers to sell

loan.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace cooks plain rice and serves it with tomato sauce, macaroni, fried fish and hot pepper sauce (shito) at Ayensudo, near Elmina, which she has done for 15 years. She is a widow. As a single parent, Grace is responsible for clothing, feeding and paying her childrens school fees and other household expenses. Grace will use the loan to purchase rice, tomatoes, cooking oil and so on. She anticipates reinvesting the new profit.

loan.use: to purchase rice, tomatoes and cooking oil

loan.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is 35 years old. She is married with 4 children; they all go to school. With the loan, Agnes will buy more soap, rice, sugar, and maize flour. She has been running her business for the period of one year and half. With the expected profits, Agnes wants to buy a motorcycle.

loan.use: to buy items to fill her store

loan.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
A sus 14 aos, Carlos Alberto es un joven emprendedor que desde pequeo aprendi las labores propias de las ventas al lado de su padre con quien venda diferentes productos en las calles del municipio de la Ceja al Oriente de Antioquia.
Con la esperanza de progresar y tener una mejor calidad de vida, este joven emprendedor inici hace poco con su negocio de venta de productos de salud y belleza los cuales espera que se conviertan en el inicio de su gran sueo tener su propio almacn.
Actualmente necesita de un prstamo para comprar productos propios de su negocio que le permitan ofrecerle a sus clientes mayor variedad y as incrementar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
At 14 years of age, Carlos Alberto is a young entrepreneur who learned how to work on his own. Along with his father, he sells different products as a street vendor in the town of La Ceja, which is east of Antioquia.

With expectations of making progress and having a better quality of life, this young entrepreneur recently launched his own business selling health and beauty products. He expects to fulfill his dream of converting this venture into his own store.

Carlos currently needs a loan to buy products for his business, which will enable him to offer his customers a wide variety and to generate profits.

loan.use: to buy health and beauty products.

loan.name: Vestine

texts.en: Vestine is 29 years old. She has 2 children, 4 and 8 years old. Vestine has sold foodstuffs for more than one year. She is requesting the loan to buy more foodstuffs to sell. She expects to use the profits to renovate the house.

loan.use: to buy more foodstuffs to sell

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: buy a variety of fruits to sell

loan.name: Angelique

texts.en: Angelique is 29 years old. She is married with three children, ages between 1 and 4; none of them have attended school yet. Angelique has been running a business of selling maize flour and rice for 6 years. She has requested the loan to buy more maize flour and rice for sale. With the profits, Angelique will buy a motorcycle for transportation and it will be another source of generating income. She would love to become a wholesaler in the future.

loan.use: to buy more maize flour and rice for sale

loan.name: Angelique

texts.en: Angelique is 26 years old. She sells beer and sodas and she has been running this business for the past 4 years. She wants the loan to increase the inventory in her pub. With the profits, she wants to reinvest in the business. She would like to become the sole distributor of the drinks in the future.

loan.use: To buy more beer and sodas to sell.

loan.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice, age 47, is married to a businessman. She has 3 children between 26 and 29 years old. She sells a local soft juice made from sorghum. With the loan she will buy more sorghum for making juice. She plans to use the profits from the business to make some savings and buy a domestic animal to raise. She dreams of having a large stock of sorghum in the future.

loan.use: To buy more sorghum for making juice.

loan.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
Jos Manuel tiene 39 aos es viudo, vive con los hijos, de 20, 15, 13 , 10 y 5 aos. Vive en el Recinto San Temistocles en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Temistocles, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz.
Jos Manuel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace seis aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es comprar un solar para construir la casa.
En los tiempos libres le gusta descansar y conversar con los hijos.
texts.en:
Jos Manuel is 39 years old, a widower, and lives with his children (ages 20, 15, 13, 10, and 5) in the neighborhood of San Temistocles in the canton of Ventanas.

The Communal Bank Narcisa de Jesus is located in the neighborhood of San Temistocles, which is in the canton of Ventanas. This group consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Jos Manuel is a farmer who has been growing corn for six years. He buys his supplies in Ventanas and sells his products at the market in the same place. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn. This will be a great help with increasing his income for the consumer needs of his family and for investment. His dream is to buy a solar panel system so that he can build a house.

In his free time, he enjoys relaxing and conversing with his children.

loan.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for growing corn.

loan.name: E-Koue Group

texts.fr: Le groupe E-KOUE est form de trois personnes qui rsident dans un mme quartier. La reprsentante de ce groupe, nomme Ayoko Sna, est celle dont la main est leve sur la photo. Cest la premire fois que ce groupe sollicite lappui financier dALID en vue dlever le niveau de leur activit. Ayoko Sna est ge de 33 ans et est marie un certain Cyprien. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains scolariss et tous leur charge. Ayoko Sna a arrt lcole au niveau secondaire. Ayoko Sna vend de la nourriture (riz, pte de mas et de la sauce) son domicile, ce qui lui permet de faire face ses diffrentes charges. Ayoko Sna achte ses produits dans un march du Bnin. Dans le but daugmenter le stock de ses produits et de mieux rpondre la demande de sa clientle, Ayoko Sna dsire obtenir un premier crdit auprs de ALID, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe E-KOUE .
texts.en: The E-KOUE group is made up of three people who live in the same neighbourhood. The group representative, called Ayoko Sna, has her hand raised in the photograph. This is the first time that this group is seeking financial assistance from ALID, with the objective of scaling up their business. Ayoko Sna is 33 years old and married to someone called Cyprien. The couple have four children living at home, some of whom attend school. Ayoko Sna stopped school at the secondary level. For twenty five years, Ayoko Sna has sold food (rice, cornmeal and sauce) from her home. Ayoko Sna buys her products in a market in Benin. In the hope of increasing her stock of products and better meeting her customers' needs, Ayoko Sna is seeking a first loan with ALID, together with the other members of the E-KOUE group.

loan.use: to buy bags of rice, corn and condiments for sauce.

loan.name: Kossi

texts.fr: Kossi est un homme g de 47 ans. Il est mari une revendeuse. Il a 5 enfants qui vont tous lcole. Le premier a 21 ans et le dernier a 13 ans. Kossi travaille comme revendeur depuis 2007. Il vend des plats, des verres boire et des palettes de boissons pour tous clients dans sa boutique. Il achte les produits Lom. Il travaille seul. Au moment, na pas de difficults. Kossi a requis son troisime crdit de WAGES afin dacheter des plats, des verres boire et des palettes de boissons. Il veut rinvestir dans lactivit. Dans les prochaines annes, Kossi voudrait agrandir la taille de lactivit. Il dit quavec les profits, il prvoit dassurer les besoins lmentaires de sa famille.
texts.en: Kossi is a 47 year old man. He is married to a retailer. He has 5 children who all attend school. The oldest is 21 years old and the youngest is 13 years old. Kossi has worked as a retailer since 2007. He sells plates, drinking glasses, and pallets of drinks for all types of customers in his store. He buys the products in Lome. He works alone. At the moment, he does not have any problems. Kossi is asking for his 3rd loan with WAGES in order to buy plates, drinking glasses, and pallets of beverages. He wants to reinvest in his business. In the coming years, Kossi would like to expand the size of his business. He says that with the profits he plans to take care of the basic needs of his family.

loan.use: to buy glasses, plates, and other items.

Con la esperanza de mejorar su surtido y sus ventas, la seora Maria necesita de la compra de diferentes productos tales como gaseosas, snacks, licor y abarrotes, soando con mejorar sus ingresos y as ampliar su negocio y la calidad de vida de su esposo y dos hijos.
texts.en:

Hoping to improve her inventory and sales, Sra. Maria needs to buy different products such as sodas, snacks, liquor, and groceries. She dreams of improving her income, expanding her business, and improving the quality of life for her husband and two children.

loan.name: Edgar

texts.es: Edgar, de 28 aos, es un joven trabajador, amable y bueno, es soltero y no tiene hijos, es por eso que vive en casa alquilada y trabaja mucho todos los das para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Edgar consiste en el transporte de pasajeros de manera colectivo dentro y fuera de la ciudad. Pasa sus das manejando su taxi, no importa si es de da o de noche, l sigue recorriendo las calles en busca de clientes que deseen llegar sanos y seguros a su destino. Su animo alegre y sus dotes de conversador hacen que los clientes lo busquen para que les haga una carrera, adems que conoce muy bien las calles de la ciudad de Pucallpa y siempre brinda un servicio rpido, al principio le fue complicado ya que le era pesado tener que manejar tanto, pero cuando empez a ver lo rentable que le era y acoplarse al ritmo, logr consolidarse. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es pasear por las calles, ya que se distrae mucho, lleva 2 aos realizando este trabajo y lo que menos le gusta es tener que lidiar con algunos pasajeros que no pagan su pasaje. Espera ms adelante comprar otro taxi y hacerlo trabajar para mejorar sus ingresos. Este ser el crdito nmero 2 con MFP, por tanto esta muy contento de saber que tendr un apoyo financiero, ya que as se sentir seguro de avanzar con su negocio, adems est muy comprometido con el pago de sus cuotas como en el anterior crdito que tuvo. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprar algunas piezas y materiales para refaccionar su vehculo, adems de renovar su documentacin que est a punto de caducar.
texts.en:
28-year-old Edgar is a hard-working, friendly young man. He is single and doesn't have any children. For this reason, he lives in a rental house and works a lot every day so that he can enjoy a better quality of life. Edgar's job is providing a collective passenger transport service both within the city and outside the city. He spends his days driving his taxi, working either days or nights. He drives the streets in search of customers who want to arrive at their destination safe and sound. He is a cheerful man and his talents as a conversationalist mean that his customers seek him out so that he can give them a ride. In addition, he knows the streets of the city of Pucallpa very well and always provides a quick service. At first things were complicated as it was difficult having to drive so much. However, when he started to see how profitable it was and he got into a rhythm, he managed to grow in his business.
What Edgar most likes about his work is driving through the streets as he really enjoys himself. He has been in this line of work for two years and what he least likes about it is having to argue with some passengers who don't pay their fare. He hopes, in the future, to buy another taxi and to work with it so that he can improve his income.
This will be Edgar's second loan from MFP and he is very happy to know that he will have financial support. This makes him feel certain that he can make progress with his business. He pledges faithfully that he will make his loan repayments on time as he did with his previous loan. Edgar will use the loan for 1,000 soles that he has requested to buy some spare parts and materials for his vehicle. He will also renew his documentation [driver's license] which is about to expire.

loan.use: to buy spare parts for his car and to renew his driver's license

loan.name: Hounkpo-Nou Group

texts.fr: Le groupe HOUNKPO-NOU est form de trois personnes qui rsident dans le mme quartier. La reprsentante de ce groupe, nomme Sofiatou Abiodoun, est celle dont la main est leve sur la photo. Cest la premire fois que ce groupe sollicite lappui financier dALID en vue dlever le niveau de leur activit. Sofiatou Abiodoun est ge de 44 ans et est marie un certain Laurent. Le couple a un enfant, scolaris et leur charge. Sofiatou Abiodoun a arrt lcole au niveau secondaire. Il y a quinze ans, Sofiatou Abiodoun vend de divers produits (conserves, savons, sucre, etc.). Ce qui lui permet de subvenir aux besoins de son enfant. Sofiatou Abiodoun achte ses produits dans un march du Bnin. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de son activit et de mieux rpondre la demande de sa clientle, Sofiatou Abiodoun dsire obtenir un premier crdit auprs de ALID, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe HOUNKPO-NOU.
texts.en: The HOUNKPO-NOU group comprises three people who live in the same neighbourhood. The group representative, called Sofiatou Abiodoun, has her hand raised in the photo. This is the first time this group is seeking financial assistance from ALID in order to increase the scale of their business. Sofiatou Abiodoun is 44 years old and is married to someone called Laurent. They have one dependent child, attending school. Sofiatou Abiodoun stopped school at the secondary level. Sofiatou Abiodoun has sold various products (canned goods, soap, sugar, etc) for fifteen years. This allows her to meet the needs of her child. Sofiatou Abiodoun buys her products in a market in Benin. With a goal of increasing the scale of her business, and to better meet her customers' needs, Sofiatou Abiodoun wishes to have this first loan with ALID, together with the other members of the HOUNKPO-NOU group.

loan.use: to purchase various products (canned goods, soaps, sugar, etc.)

loan.name: Andrei

texts.en: Andrei is married and has an 11 year-old daughter. He lives in Ivano-Frankivsk and is involved in passenger transportation across Ukraine. He always has orders, and a system of flexible discounts gives him a good advantage. Andrei has regular customers, and he delivers packages from Italy every day. He has been involved in this business for nine years, 10-12 hours per day. His monthly income is 5,000 hryvnia. Andrei works on a car that was purchased by using a loan, which he has now fully repaid. His car was converted to run on compressed gas, which gives him an opportunity to operate it economically. Andrei plans to invest the funds received from Kiva into a purchase of winter tires and an accumulator battery, in order to bring his vehicle up to a good condition. With time, Andrei hopes to purchase a newer and better-quality transportation vehicle.

loan.use: purchase winter tires and an accumulator battery, in order to bring his vehicle up to a good condition

loan.name: Johan

texts.es: Johan, tiene la edad de 22 aos, est en unin libre y vive con su esposa que es su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crdito comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal, como lo son los abonos, herbicidas y pago de mano de obra. El actualmente cuenta con una plantacin es estado regular pues acaba de pasar la cosecha y su cafetal necesita de la mejora de condiciones para mejorar para la prxima cosecha, por lo cual es que har esta asistencia a su cafetal. El pretende con el crdito y la mejora a su cafetal obtener el mximo de ganancias para su bienestar familiar y tener una estabilidad econmica ms estable. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en:
Johan is 22 years old. He lives with his common-law wife who is his main priority. He plans to use his loan to buy the supplies he needs to maintain his coffee plantation. He will buy fertilizers and herbicides, and pay laborers. Johan currently has a plantation which is in an average state. He has just harvested and he needs to improve the condition of his plantation so that he can improve his next harvest. This is why he will provide it with this care.
Johan plans to use his loan to improve his plantation so that he can obtain maximum profits for his family's well-being and enjoy greater financial stability. This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR. He hasn't received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loan.use: to maintain his coffee plantation

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy more stock of drinks like beers, soda, whiskey and wine.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase flour, sugar and oil.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase more palm fruit and palm kernels for oil production.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase more ladies' handbags and slippers for her business.

loan.name: Alexander

texts.en: Alexander is married and has an adult daughter. He lives in Vodyanoye and is involved in growing early vegetables, such as tomatoes and radishes. Alexander has two large greenhouses and two separate greenhouses for seedlings. He has 70,000 hryvnia invested into the farming business. His annual expenses amount to 25,000 hryvnia. Alexander has been involved in growing vegetables for six years. He plans to invest the 14,000 hryvnia loan into the purchase of plastic, seeds and fixtures for an additional greenhouse. Alexander understands that this is a very promising business for this agricultural region. This is why he plans future expansion next year. He wants to purchase land and build additional greenhouses there.

loan.use: to purchase plastic, seeds and fixtures for an additional greenhouse

loan.name: Carlos Armando

texts.es:
Carlos Armando tiene 23 aos es soltero, vive con los padres no tiene hijos. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantn Ventanas.
Ventanilla VALLE ALTO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Carlos Armando se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y arroz en terrenos propios. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueo es comprar una casa ms grande.
Disfruta mucho en sus tiempos libres haciendo deporte.
texts.en:
Carlos Armando is 23 years old. He is single and lives with his parents. He does not have any children. He lives in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.
The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.
Carlos Armando is a farmer who grows corn and rice on his own land. He buys his products in Ventanas and sells his products in Ventanas market.
Carlos Armando will use the loan that he requested to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure. The loan will help him to increase his income which means he will be able to help his family and invest in his farming. His dream is to buy a bigger house.
Carlos Armando enjoys taking part in sports in his free time.

loan.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loan.name: Mujeres Responsables Group

texts.es: El Banco Mujeres Responsable, est formado por mujeres emprendedores que han luchado por cumplir sus sueos de tener un medio que le genere ingresos para la familia. Este banco lo conforman 10 integrantes de la misma localidad que son personas que se conocen y tienen objetivos y metas en la vida. Cada uno de los integrantes brindan un servicio diferente pero siempre con el objetivo de brindarles a sus clientes un buen servicio. Nora que es la presidenta del grupo y su actividad econmica a la que se dedica es la elaboracin de artesana lo cual tiene aos de experiencia, este negocio lo aprendi de forma emprica, ya que la mama le enseo y ahora ella se lo transmite a sus hijos que todava se encuentran a su cargo y trabajan con ella para salir adelante, el crdito que est solicitando es para la compra de materia prima como cermica, pintura y otros productos para la elaboracin de las artesanas. Actualmente todos los integrantes estn solicitando financiamiento para poder abastecerse de materia de prima.
texts.en:
The 'Mujeres Responsables' (Responsible Women) community bank is a group of entrepreneurial women who have worked hard to achieve their dreams of having a way of making income for their families. This bank has ten members who are all from the same town. They all know each other and all have goals and aims in life. Each one of the members provides a different service but they all share the aim of providing their customers with a good service.
Nora is the group's president and her business is making handicrafts. She has years of experience in this line of work. She learned the business from direct experience as her mom taught her. Now she, in turn, is passing on the knowledge to her children who are in her care and work with her in order to get ahead in life. Nora is requesting this loan to buy raw materials such as pottery, paint and other products for making handicrafts. All the members of the group are requesting the loan to stock up with raw materials.

loan.use: to buy raw materials such as pottery, paint and other products, for making handicrafts

loan.name: Lydia

texts.en: Lydia buys fresh fish from the market and fries them to sell at Ayensudo at Elmina. Lydia is married to a driver and has 4 dependents. She uses her income to assist her husband in paying their childrens school fees. A loan will help buy more fresh fish to fry and sell, and this will result in an increase in sales which will enable her to expand her business.

loan.use: buy more fresh fish to fry and sell.

loan.name: Aba

texts.en: Aba has been a baker at Ayensudu near Elmina for four years now. She is a single parent with one child. As a single parent she feeds, clothes, and pays her child's school fees with her income. Aba needs this loan to purchase bags of flour, sugar, and oil for baking. With the new profit, Aba would like to give her child the best education.

loan.use: to purchase bags of flour, sugar, and oil for baking

loan.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena, de 23 aos, es una mujer buena, amable y trabajadora, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene una hija de tres aos, viven en una casa propia en donde comparten la alegra de educar y criar a su hija por quien hacen todos los esfuerzos y sacrificios necesarios para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Elena consiste en la venta de golosinas y productos de consumo de preferencia de los nios, posee un puesto en donde realiza su venta de golosinas. ste se encuentra ubicada en uno de los parques mas concurridos de su ciudad, su da normalmente comienza a las 8 de la maana y termina pasadas las 6 de la tarde. Entre todo este tiempo ella aprovecha algunos minutos de poca venta para ir a ver a su hija, quien todava es muy pequea y necesita mucha atencin. Es una de las cosas que ms le complican en su trabajo, pero tambin es algo que sabe que pronto podr superar, ya que su hija crece cada da mas. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es la libertad que tiene para realizar otras actividades, a la vez que cuida su puesto de golosinas. Lleva 3 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil de su trabajo es tener que permanecer bajo el inclemente sol todo el da, espera que con el tiempo pueda poner una tienda donde pueda atender mejor a sus clientes. Este ser el crdito nmero 7 con la institucin MFP, siempre fue muy buena socia en su banco comunal en donde la quieren mucho por que es muy responsable y solidaria. Espera que le puedan brindar el prstamo que ser un respaldo para ella y seguir aumentando su negocio. Esta convencida que seguir siendo una socia muy puntual y pagara sus cuotas a tiempo como todos los prestamos que tuvo hasta ahora. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprar ms variedad de golosinas para poder ofrecer a sus clientes y as tenerlo mas implementado.
texts.en:
Elena, 23 years old, is a good women, friendly and hardworking. She lives with her partner with whom she has a 3 year old daughter. They live in their own home where they share the happiness of educating and bringing up their daughter and they put forth all their strength and make the necessary sacrifices in order to provide her a good quality of life.
Elenas work consists of selling sweets and products that children enjoy eating. She has a stand where she sells her sweets. It is located in one of the busiest parks in the city. Her day normally begins at 8:00AM in the morning and finishes at 6:00PM in the afternoon. During this time she takes advantage of any moments when sales are low to go see her daughter who is still very young and needs a lot of attention. It is one of the things that complicate her work, but too it is something that she knows will soon pass, as each day her daughter grows a bit more.
The thing that she like most about her work is the freedom that she has to do other activities at the same time she is at her sweet stand. She has been doing this for three years and what she considers the most difficult thing about her work is having to be under the relentless sun all day. She hopes that with time she will be able to have a store where she can serve her clients better.
This will be her 7th loan with MFP. She has always been a good member of the communal bank which she likes very much because of the care and unity. She hopes that you can provide the loan that will back her up so she can continue to expand her business. She is convinced that she would continue being a very punctual member and would pay her installments on time as she has done with all her loans so far. With the 1500 soles, she will have a greater variety of sweets to offer her customers and thus, more of it will be sold.

loan.use: to buy more sweets to supply her business

loan.name: Hilda Leopoldina

texts.es:
Hilda tiene 24 aos es soltera, vive con los hijos de 8,4 aos. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantn Ventanas.
Ventanilla VALLE ALTO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Hilda se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y arroz en terrenos propios. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueo es comprar un terreno para construir la casa.
Le gusta ayudar a los hijos hacer las tares.
texts.en:
Hilda, single, is 24 years old. She lives with her 2 children who are 8 and 4 years old. She lives in Recinto Voluntad de Dios in the Ventanas canton.
The VALLE ALTO Communal Bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, belonging to the canton of Ventanas. This area works in short-cycle crops such as corn, rice and pigeon peas.
Hilda works in agriculture growing corn and rice on her own property. She buys the supplies in Ventanas and sells them at the market in Ventanas.
The money from this loan will be used to buy seed, fertilizer and compost for the crops. The loan will help her to increase her income for household expenses and to invest in planting. Her dream is to buy land to build a house. She likes to help the children with their chores.

loan.use: to buy seed to plant corn and rice, to buy supplies and fertilizer for the crops

loan.name: Johnny

texts.es: Johnny, tiene la edad de 46 aos, est casado y vive con su esposa e hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crdito comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal, como lo son los abonos y herbicidas. El actualmente cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotacin de este cultivo y adems de tener ya varios aos de experiencia para el buen manejo del cultivo. l le har una mejora a la plantacin de caf que posee para as obtener los mejores resultados de esta. El tienen como meta generar una muy buena cosecha para as venderla y obtener uno buenos ingresos para mejorar su bienestar y su estabilidad econmica. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en:
Johnny is 46 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and children who are his main priority.
He plans to use the money from the loan to buy supplies to care for his coffee plantation, such as compost and herbicides.
Currently he has the land ready for cultivating and furthermore he has some years experience knowing how to manage the crop. He will make improvements to the coffee plantation in order to have the best results. He has as a goal to harvest a better crop to sell to obtain a good profit to improve his wellbeing and his financial standing.
This is the first loan that he has received through Fudecosur. He has not had other loans before from the state banks, but Fudecosur has given the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loan.use: to buy supplies to care for his coffee plantation, such as compost and herbicides

loan.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is a single parent with one child. She is a petty trader. She sells utensils, soap, and underwear at Ayensudo. As a single parent, she feeds, clothes, and pays her child's school fees. Esther will use her loan to purchase more utensils for sale. With the new profit, Esther wishes to expand her business by acquiring a shop for her business.

loan.use: to buy more utensils for sale

loan.name: Mikhail

texts.en: Mikhail is married and has one child. They live in the city of Hust in western Ukraine. Mikhail works for a construction company. He's a dedicated employee and is always ready to stand by the quality of his work. Although he's worked construction his whole life, Mikhail cannot boast of a high salary; his monthly income is only 2,500 grivnas. Mikhail requires a personal loan of 10,000 grivnas. He wishes to repair his bathroom: exchange the toliet, put in a sink and glazed floor tiles. These repairs will provide his family with a more comfortable life.

loan.use: to repair his bathroom: exchange the toilet, insert a new sink and put in glazed floor tiles.

loan.name: Francisco

texts.es: El seor Francisco naci en la localidad de la Angostura actualmente se encuentra viviendo en la localidad de limoncito por mas de cinco aos convive con la seora Dilma tienen dos hijas una de 4 aos de edad y otra de 2 aos. El se dedica a la mecnica los fines de semana en la localidad del Torno en el taller de su hermano, y entre semana trabaja como albail en la ciudad de Santa Cruz. El crdito lo esta solicitando para comprar material de construccin para terminar su vivienda ya que le falta construir un cuarto mas para las nias y as brindarles mayor comodidad a su familia, el esta muy agradecido con la institucin por la oportunidad que le brindan para mejorar su calidad de vida de el y de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Francisco was born in the town of Angostura. He has been living in the town of Limoncito for more than 5 years with his partner Dilma and they have 2 daughters. One is 4 years old and the other is 2 years old.
He is a mechanic working on weekends in the town of Torno in his brothers workshop and during the week he works as a bricklayer in the city of Santa Cruz.
He is asking for a loan to buy construction material in order to finish his house as it needs one more room for the children in order to give the family more comfortable living conditions.
He is very grateful to the institution for the opportunity it gives him of improving the quality of life for him and all of his family.

loan.use: to buy construction materials to finish his house

loan.name: Maryuri Mariuxi

texts.es:
Maryuri tiene 22 aos es soltera, vive con un hijo de 3 aos. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantn Ventanas.
Ventanilla VALLE ALTO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Maryuri se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y arroz en terrenos de familiares. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueo es comprar un terreno para seguir sembrando.
Le gusta pasar con el hijo jugando.
texts.en:
Maryuri is 22 years old, single, and lives with her 3 year old son. She lives in Voluntad de Dios in the canton of Ventanas.
The Valle Alto Communal Bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, belonging to the canton of Ventanas. This area is dedicated to agriculture activities of short-cycle planting of corn, rice, and pigeon peas.
Maryuri works in agriculture planting crops of corn and rice on family property. She buys her supplies in Ventanas, and she sells her crops at the market in Ventanas.
She is asking for this loan in order to buy seed, fertilizer and compost for the crops. The loan will help her increase her income for family use and to buy seed. Her dream is to buy land to continue planting.
She likes to spend time playing with her son.

loan.use: to buy seed, fertilizer, and compost for the crops

loan.name: Bonny Tatiana

texts.es:
Bonny Tatiana tiene 23 aos vive en unin libre, vive con el compaero y con los hijos. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantn Ventanas.
Ventanilla VALLE ALTO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Bonny se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y arroz en terrenos de familiares. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueo es comprar un terreno y vehculo de trabajo.
Le gusta descansar y ver la televisin.
texts.en:
Bonny Tatiana is 23 years old and lives with her partner and children. She lives in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.
The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.
Bonny is a farmer who grows corn and rice on land belonging to family members. She makes her purchases in Ventanas and makes her sales in Ventanas market.
Bonny will use the loan that she requested to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure. The loan will help her to increase her income which means she will be able to help her family and invest in her farming. Her dream is to buy a plot of land and a vehicle for her work.
In her free time, Bonny likes to relax and watch television.

loan.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loan.name: San Jose Group

texts.es: La Sra. Angelica tiene 52 aos de edad tiene dos hijos adultos quienes han sido su motor para salir adelante y hou en da son su apoyo en todos los proyectos que ella emprende. Desde hace 10 aos la Sra. Angelica inici su negocio vendiendo comida ahi mismo coloc una pequea vitrina con golosinas, actualmente solo se dedica a la venta de golosinas y aprovecha de campaas para venta de ropa y juguetes. Gracias a su trabajo ella ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos, brindarles estudios y mejorar su casa. Una de sus metas es ampliar su negocio a lo mejor ofreciendo sus golosinas al por mayor. En sta ocasin ella invertir en la compra de adornos navideos para aprovechar la demanda en el mes de diciembre.
texts.en:
Angelica is 52 years old and has two grown-up children who have been the driving force behind her getting ahead in life. Now they are her support in all the projects that she undertakes.
Ten years ago, Angelica started her food business where she also set up a small display case with some candies inside. She currently only sells candies but also makes the most of the different sales seasons in order to sell clothes and toys.
Thanks to her work, Angelica has managed to get her children ahead in life, provide them with an education and improve their home. One of her aims is to expand her business, probably offering her candies wholesale.
On this occasion, Angelica will invest in buying Christmas ornaments in order to make the most of the demand which exists during the month of December.

loan.use: to buy Christmas ornaments to sell over the Christmas period

loan.name: Dorris

texts.en: Dorris is 38 years old and lives in Congo Town. She is married and has four children between the ages of 10 and 21. All of them are attending school: two with their aunt and two living at home. Dorris has been making soap for the past twenty years. She says her main challenge is the cost for palm oil that she uses to make soap. She started this business with money that she saved. She learned this business from her friends. Her favorite part about her business is the fast profits. She is requesting a loan to purchase more goods (caustic, palm oil, and wood) for her business. In the future, she wants to build a house for her children.

loan.use: to purchase more goods (caustic, palm oil, and wood) for making soap

loan.name: Mario Jos

texts.es:
Mario Jos tiene 33 aos vive en unin libre, vive con la compaera y la hija. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantn Ventanas.
Ventanilla VALLE ALTO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Mario Jos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueo es comprar un terreno.
Le gusta dedicarse a los hijos.
texts.en:
Mario Jos is 33 years old and in a common law marriage. He lives with his wife and daughter in the community of Recinto Voluntad de Dios of the Ventanas canton.
The VALLE ALTO communal bank is located in the community Voluntad de Dios, which belongs to the Ventanas canton. This bank is dedicated to short cycle agricultural work such as corn, rice and beans.
Mario Jos works in agricultural, growing rice and corn. He buys his products in Ventanas and does his selling in the Ventanas market.
The loan he has asked for is to buy seeds and fertilizer for his crops. The loan has helped to increase his income for his family and to invest in his crops. His dream is to buy a plot of land.
He likes to spend time with his children.

loan.use: to buy seed and fertilizers for his crops.

loan.name: Vctor Pascual

texts.es:
Vctor Pascual tiene 47 aos es casado, vive con la esposa y con los hijos. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantn Ventanas.
Ventanilla VALLE ALTO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Vctor Pascual se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, arroz y frejol gandul. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueo es comprar un terreno.
Le gusta descansar y escuchar msica.
texts.en:
Vctor Pascual is 47 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and children. He lives in the community of Recinto Voluntad de Dios in the Ventanas canton.
The VALLE ALTO communal bank is located in the community of Voluntad de Dios, which belongs to the Ventanas canton. This bank is dedicated to short cycle agricultural work such as corn, rice and gandul beans.
Vctor Pascual works in agriculture growing corn, rice and gandul beans. He buys his products in Ventanas and does his selling in the Ventanas market.
The loan he asked for is to buy seed and fertilizer for his crops. The loan has helped him to increase his income for his family and to invest in his crops. His dream is to buy a plot of land.
He likes to rest and listen to music.

loan.use: to buy seed and fertilizer for his crops.

loan.name: Alejandrina Pilar

texts.es:
Alejandrina Pilar tiene 48 aos es soltera, vive con los hijos. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantn Ventanas.
Ventanilla VALLE ALTO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Alejandra se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y arroz desde hace algunos aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueo es comprar vehculo.
texts.en:
Alejandrina Pilar is 48 years old. She is single and lives with her children in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.
The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.
Alejandrina is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for some years. She makes her purchases in Ventanas and makes her sales in Ventanas market.
Alejandrina requested this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure. The loan will help her to increase her income so that she can provide for her family and invest in her farming. Her dream is to buy a vehicle.

loan.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loan.name: Maria Narcisa

texts.es:
Mara Narcisa tiene 31 aos es soltera, vive con los hijos. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantn Ventanas.
Ventanilla VALLE ALTO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz y frejol gandul. Mara Narcisa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y arroz desde hace algunos aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueo es dar el estudio a los hijos para que tengan una profesin.
Le gusta jugar con los hijos y salir de paseo.
texts.en:
Mara Narcisa is 31 years old. She is single and lives with her children in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.
The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.
Mara Narcisa is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for some years. She makes her purchases in Ventanas and makes her sales in Ventanas market.
Mara Narcisa requested this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure. The loan will help her to increase her income so that she can provide for her family and invest in her farming. Her dream is to provide her children with an education so that they can become professionals.
In her free time, Mara Narcisa enjoys playing with her children and going out for walks.

loan.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase food ingredients for her dishes

loan.name: Moustapha

texts.fr: Moustaphat habite dans la rgion sud sngal,mari pre de 3 enfants ,deux garon et une fille de 11 mois.Les 2 enfants sont l'cole et la fillette reste la maison avec sa mama qui est mnagre,avec son mtier,il supporte toutes les charge de sa famille. Moustapha a dmarr son mtier dans la capitale du sngal l'age de 16 ans.Depuis 1983,il a eu son diplome,pour revenir travailler dans sa localit.Avec ce crdit,il achte du bois l'est de la rgion pour venir confectionner des meuble qui seront exposs pour la vente. moustapha dans l'avenir,veut avior des machines de rabotage,siage ,et largir le nombre d'employs dans son atelier de travail
texts.en: Moustapha lives the southern region of Senegal. He is married and the father of 3 children - two boys and an 11 month old girl. The two eldest go to school, and the young girl stays at home with his mother, who is a housewife. With his craft, he covers all the expenses of the family. Moustapha started his activity in the capital of Senegal at 16 years of age. He has had his diploma since 1983, and returned to work in his local area. With this loan, he will purchase wood in the east of the region, in order to create furniture which will be displayed for sale. In the future, Moustapha wants to have machinery for planing and sawing, and to increase the numbers of employees in his workshop.

loan.use: to buy wood for woodworking, to strengthen his workshop.

loan.name: Carmen Pilar

texts.es:
Carmen Pilar tiene 24 aos es soltera, vive con el hijo de 5 meses de edad y los padres. Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantn Ventanas.
Ventanilla VALLE ALTO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz y frejol gandul. Carmen Pilar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueo es tener dinero para su hijo por que es madre soltera.
Le gusta cuidar con su hijo.
texts.en:
Carmen Pilar is 24 years old. She is single and lives with her 5-month-old son and parents in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.
The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.
Carmen Pilar is a farmer who grows corn. She makes her purchases in Ventanas and makes her sales in Ventanas market. She requested this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure. The loan will help her to increase her income which will allow her to provide for her family and invest in her farming. Her dream is to have money for her son because she is a single mother. She likes to take care of her son.

loan.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loan.name: Elida

texts.es: Elida, de 47 aos, es una mujer amable, buena y muy trabajadora, esta casada con Hermogenes quien es su compaero incondicional desde hace muchos aos, fruto a su matrimonio tienen dos hijos quienes ya son mayores y tiene familia propia. Juntos habitan en una casa propia en donde educaron y brindaron lo mejor a sus hijos. Ahora trabajan mucho para poder tener una vejez tranquila. El negocio de Elida consiste en dos cosas, el primero es el de vender golosinas en la puerta de un colegio de la ciudad a la hora de entrada y salida. Cuando no esta en el centro educativo se va a ubicarse en uno de los parques ms importantes de la ciudad de Pucallpa, ella a puesto todo su empeo en hacer de su pequeo negocio uno de los ms concurridos por lo clientes. Los cuales la prefieren a ella debido a la amabilidad con que los trata. Adems de vender ah tiene una pequea pero muy surtida tienda de abarrotes en su casa el cual se hace cargo su esposo. Con el tiempo pudieron encontrar la manera de trabajar juntos y as producir ambos los ingresos a su hogar. Los 5 aos que lleva en este negocio le han servido para ganarse un lugar preferencial en el parque, ya que esta ubicada en la esquina ms transitada, donde es mucho ms fcil de encontrarla. Lo que ms le gusta es conversar con sus vecinas de venta, pero lo que menos le gusta es tener que permanecer todo el da en su puesto sin poder ir a ningn lado. Espera ms adelante poner su tienda de golosinas, la cual le pueda dar mejores ingresos. Este ser el crdito nmero 11 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendr un apoyo financiero para poder continuar aumentando su capital de trabajo. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprar productos para implementar su venta de golosinas, adems de algunos abarrotes y cosas para su tienda.
texts.en:
47-year-old Elida is a kind and hard-working woman. She is married to Hermogenes who has been her unconditional partner for many years. The couple have two children who are now grown up and have their own families. They live together in their own home where they educated their children and provided them with the best. They work a lot now so that they can enjoy a peaceful old age.
Elida's has two businesses. Firstly, she sells candies outside a school in the city at the beginning and end of the school day. When she is not at the school, she goes to one of the most important parks in the city of Pucallpa. She has put a great deal of effort into ensuring her business is one of the most popular with the customers. The customers prefer to buy from her because of the kindness she displays when she serves them. In addition to selling in this location, she also has a small but very well-stocked grocery store in her home which her husband takes care of. Over time, they have been able to find a way of working together so that they can both make income for their household.
The five years that Elida has spent working in this business have enabled her to gain a preferential location in the park as her stall is located in the busiest corner where it is much easier to find her. What she enjoys about her business is chatting to her fellow traders. What she least enjoys is having to stay on her stall all day without being able to go anywhere. She hopes, in the future, to set up a candy store which will make her better income.
This will be Elida's 11th loan from MFP. She is very happy to know that she will have financial support so that she can continue increasing her working capital. She will use the 1,000 soles that she has requested to buy products with which to stock her candy business. She will also buy some groceries and products for her store.

loan.use: to buy candies and soda to stock her stall. She will also buy products to stock her store

loan.name: Yessenia

texts.es:
Yessenia, es una joven soltera muy emprendedora que a sus 19 aos de edad tiene un negocio propio dedicado a la venta de ropa, desde hace 9 meses, los cuales han sido de mucho esfuerzo y lucha constante para salir adelante, gracias a esa fuerza interior con la que cuenta. Vive en casa de su ta a la cual apoya con el fruto de su trabajo, Yessenia demuestra ser una joven luchadora trabajando tambin en un viedo como operaria y con los ingresos que obtiene en esta labor, los invierte en su negocio de venta ropa.
Con el prstamo al cual desea acceder, ella comprara ms ropa para su negocio y as poder crecer aun mas, el mayor sueo de Yessenia es mejorar al mximo su calidad de vida, estudiar para seguir una carrera que la ayude a mejorar en su negocio y asimismo incrementar su mercadera sobre todo demostrar que ella a sus 19 aos puede ser una mujer de xito.
Gracias a la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva ella podr realizar sus sueos y no solo eso, sino tambin desarrollarse como una microempresaria y mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Yessenia is a young single woman. She is very enterprising and, at 19 years of age, she has her own business selling clothes. She has been in this business for nine months and it has required a lot of effort and constant hard work in order to make progress. She has managed to achieve this thanks to her internal strength. Yessenia lives in her aunt's house and supports her with the fruit of her work. Yessenia is a tenacious young woman who also works as a laborer in a vineyard. She invests the income she makes from that work in her clothes business.
Yessenia will use the loan that she is requesting to buy more clothes for her business so that she can grow it even further. Her biggest dream is to improve her quality of life to the max. She would like to study for a degree which will help her to improve her business. She would also like to increase her merchandise and, above all, show that at 19 years of age she can be a successful woman.
Thanks to the help of Kiva lenders, Yessenia will be able to fulfill her dreams. Not only that, she will also be able to develop as a micro-businesswoman and improve her profits.

loan.use: to buy clothes

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase more groceries for sale.

loan.name: Dora Clemencia

texts.es:
Dora Clemencia tiene 43 aos vive en Unin Libre, vive con el compaero y con los 5 hijos.Vive en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios en el Cantn Ventanas.
Ventanilla VALLE ALTO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Voluntad de Dios, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz y frejol gandul. Dora se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado de Ventanas.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir en la siembra. Su sueo es que sus hijos sean profesionales y tengan un trabajo digno. Le gusta trabajar duro.
texts.en:
Dora Clemencia is 43 years old and lives together with her partner and five children in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton.
The Valle Alto community bank is located in Voluntad de Dios, in Ventanas canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.
Dora is a farmer who grows corn. She makes her purchases in Ventanas and makes her sales in Ventanas market.
Dora has requested this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure. The loan will help her to increase her income so that she can provide for her family and invest in her farming. Her dream is for her children to become professionals and have decent jobs.
Dora enjoys working hard.

loan.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure

loan.name: Olvin Damin

texts.es: Olvin de 30 aos de edad, es soltero, vive en San Luis Planes Santa Brbara con su familia. Olvin desde pequeo realiza actividades de cultivo de caf con su familia y trabajos de serigrafa, es una persona muy trabajadora, actualmente tiene cultivado 1 manzana de caf, de la cual saca produccin de caf pergamino hmedo y lo vende en el mercado local, pero muchas veces llegan los compradores hasta su casa. Esta motivado con el cultivo ya que este producto tiene gran demanda y va obtener buenas ganancias. A solicitado este prstamo de L.13,000.00 para invertir en siembra de vivero ampliando as 1/4 mas de manzana de terreno, donde va cubrir pago de jornaleros y fertilizantes para dicha siembra. Su plan es mejorar la produccin y seguir obteniendo ganancias.
texts.en:
Olvin is 30 years old and single. He lives in San Luis Planes Santa Brbara with his family. Ever since he was little he has worked with his family growing coffee. He also does screen printing jobs. He is a very hard-working person.
He currently has one manzana (just under a half of an acre) where he is growing coffee. He takes his production of wet parchment coffee to sell at the local market. However, the buyers often come to his house. He is motivated with farming because this product is in great demand, and he will get good income.
He has requested this loan for 13,000 lempira to invest in planting the nursery. This way he will expand to of a manzana more land. He will use the loan to pay the day workers and to buy fertilizers for the crop. His plan is to improve production and to continue getting income.

loan.use: to invest in planting the coffee nursery, to pay the day workers, and to buy fertilizers.

loan.name: Mariama

texts.en: Mariama is a petty trader selling tin tomatoes, salt, charcoal and other food items in Ayensudo, near Elmina. She has been selling charcoal for two years. Mariama is married to a businessman and has three children. She uses her income to assist the husband in paying utility bills. She needs this loan to buy more food items and charcoal for sale. With the new profit, Mariama will expand her business.

loan.use: buy more food items and charcoal for sale

loan.name: Librada

texts.es: La seora Librada a sus 46 aos de edad se dedica desde hace 6 aos a la confeccin de camas para bebe, realiza su trabajo sola y presenta dificultades puesto que le hace falta una maquina de coser que le permita agilizar su trabajo y as poder aumentar su produccin y nmero de clientes y con esto su calidad de vida y la de sus padres. La seora Librada tiene la f de poder conseguir la maquina de la cual carece y poder as cumplir con sus pedidos, mejorar su produccin y cumplir su sueo de poder ampliar su taller de confeccin.
texts.en: Librada is 46 years old. She has been making baby bedding for six years. She carries out her work alone and faces difficulties because she lacks a sewing machine which would allow her to work more easily. It would enable her to increase her production and her number of customers, and thereby improve her own quality of life and that of her parents. Librada believes that she will be able to acquire the machine that she lacks and thereby fill her orders, improve her production and fulfill her dream of expanding her sewing workshop.

loan.use: to buy a sewing machine

loan.name: Jenneh

texts.en: Jenneh is 37 years old and lives in Congo Town. She is married with four children between 9 and 18 years old. They are in school and live at home. Jenneh has been operating a cook shop (restaurant) for the past twenty-five years. She says her main challenge is the location of her restaurant. Jenneh started this business with the help of her husband and she has learned this business from her mother. Her favorite part about her business is that her food sells out everyday and she makes good profit. Jenneh is requesting this loan to purchase more goods (coal, rice, onion, peppers, and oil) for her restaurant. In the future, she would like to build a house.

loan.use: to purchase more goods (coal, rice, onion, peppers, and oil) for her business

loan.name: Ilda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN DE LAS NIEVES; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Ilda; ella tiene 45 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende arroz,azcar,leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueo de la socia es tener ms adelante un carro. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar arroz, azcar, leche, aceite y galletas al por mayor.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ilda is a member of the Virgen de Las Nieves communal bank. The bank is in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.
Hilda, age 45, is in a common-law marriage and has four children. She alternates her daily activities with her grocery store business. She sells rice, sugar, milk, and oil. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. It is through this business that she gets her children ahead.
Her dream for later on is to have a car.
She is requesting the loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, oil, and cookies wholesale.
She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loan.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, oil, and cookies wholesale.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase cassava, maize and other food items in bulk

loan.name: Yovana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN DE LAS NIEVES; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Yovana; ella tiene 38 aos de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en un laboratorio, ella trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, tambin la socia se dedica al negocio compra y venta de carros junto con su esposo y de esta manera sacan adelante a su hijo, el sueo de la socia es tener su propio laboratorio. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar repuestos para el negocio de compra y venta de carros.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Yovana is a member of the Virgen de Las Nieves communal bank. The bank is in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.
Yovana, age 38, is in a common-law marriage and has one child. She alternates her daily activities with her her work in a lab. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. She also has a business together with her husband of buying and selling cars. This is the way they get their child ahead.
Her dream is to have her own lab.
She is requesting the loan to buy replacement parts for the business of buying and selling cars.
She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loan.use: to buy replacement parts for the business of buying and selling cars.

loan.name: Gustavo

texts.es: Gustavo, de 24 aos, es un joven padre de familia muy amable, sencillo y trabajador, vive en casa de sus padres junto a su conviviente Mariela de 18 aos y su querido hijo Ken de 3 aos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Gustavo consiste en la compra y venta de pescado. Desde hace mucho tiempo viene realizando esta actividad que le permite ser su fuente econmica y as puede mantener a su familia con la tranquilidad de que no le falte nada en su casa. su constante animo de superacin ha hecho que incursione en este negocio y poco a poco se ha hecho muy conocido, ya que l vende el pescado ms fresco y sabroso del mercado y es un vendedor muy alegre, que siempre recibe a sus clientes una sonrisa. Adems alquila un vehiculo el cual le proporciona un ingreso adicional, al principio le fue muy complicado, pero con el pasar del tiempo empez a consolidarse. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientas. Lleva 4 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que los ms difcil es soportar el intenso olor que sale de los pescados, ya que se impregna en la ropa. Espera tener en el futuro un vehiculo acondicionado que le permita transportar sus productos sin que se malogren. Este ser el tercer prstamo con MFP, esta muy contento de saber que tendr un apoyo financiero, ya que as se sentir seguro de avanzar con su negocio, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crditos que tuvo. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 soles, comprar mas productos para seguir vendiendo, a parte de dar mantenimiento a su vehiculo comprndole algunas piezas y pagando al mecnico que le haga el trabajo.
texts.en:
Gustavo, age 24, is a young father who is very kind, unassuming, and hard-working. He lives in his parents house with his common-law wife, 18 year old Mariela, and his beloved three year old son, Ken. He wants to give them a better quality of life.
Gustavo buys and sells fish. He has been doing this for a long time, and it is his source of income. This is the way he manages to support his family with the peace of mind that they lack for nothing at home. His constant motivation to excel led him to enter this business and he has made himself very well-known over time because he sells the freshest and most delicious fish at the market. He is a pleasant salesman who always greets his customers with a smile.
He also rents a vehicle, which provides him with additional income. At first it was very complicated for him, but in time he became more capable.
What he likes the most about his work is talking with his customers. He has been doing this business activity for four years. He considers the most difficult part to be putting up with the intense smell of the fish because it permeates his clothes. He hopes in the future to have a vehicle that is set up to allow him to transport his products without the bad odor.
This will be his third loan with MFP. He is very happy to know that he will have financial support. That way he will feel certain that his business will advance. He pledges, once again, to make his payments on time as he did with the previous loans that he had. He will use the requested 2,000 soles to buy more products in order to keep selling. He will also have maintenance performed on his vehicle. He will buy some parts and pay a mechanic to do the work.

loan.use: to buy more fish in order to stock his stand and to provide maintenance to his vehicle.

loan.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal VIRGEN DE LAS NIEVES; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Julio Cesar; el tiene 28 aos de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en la liga de basket, ella trabaja en el rea administrativa en arbitraje, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio el socio quiere salir adelante, el sueo del socio es tener su propia academia donde pueda ensear basket. El socio solicita el prstamo para comprar un equipo de sonido para implementar su casa.
El socio est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: This member belongs to the "Virgen de las Nieves" Communal Bank. This bank is located in the distruct of Cusco, belonging to the province and department of Cusco. This is Mr. Julio Cesar. He is 28 and single. He shares his daily activities with his work with the basketball league as a referee. He works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. He wants to get ahead through this work. His dream is to have his own academy where he can teach basketball. He is requesting this loan to buy sound equipment for his home. He is happy to have this loan and promises to repay his quotas on time.

loan.use: to buy sound equipment for his home.

loan.name: Pedro Jorge

texts.es:
Pedro Jorge tiene 41 aos casado, vive con la esposa y dos hijos, de 10 y 5 aos. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz y frejol gandul. Pedro Parra se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y arroz desde hace diez aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende a cualquier comerciante.
El crdito solicito para la compra insumos, semillas, fertilizantes y poder sembrar del maz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos y el bienestar de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es comprar una finca.
Le gusta hacer deporte con los vecinos del barrio.
texts.en:
Pedro Jorge is 41 years old. He is married and lives together with his wife and two children who are 10 and 5 years old. He lives in Amrica, in Ventanas canton.
The 'Unidos Venceremos' community bank is located in Amrica, in Ventanas canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.
Pedro Jorge is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for ten years. He makes his purchases in Ventanas and sells his produce to any trader.
Pedro Jorge requested this loan to buy supplies, seeds and fertilizers so that he can sow his corn. The loan will help him to increase his income, improve his family's well-being, and invest. His dream is to buy a farm.
Pedro Jorge enjoys taking part in sports alongside his neighbors.

loan.use: to buy supplies, seeds and fertilizers

loan.name: Rosalina Alejandra

texts.es: Rosalina Alejandra es una emprendedora que ha tenido xitos, su actividad econmica es la venta de mercadera en general , no es la primera vez que la seora Rosalina tiene crdito con Fundacin Len 2000, ella nos explica que gracias al apoyo que se le brindado ha aumentado su inventario ofrecindole a sus clientes variedad de productos. Rosalinda est solicitando actualmente crdito para comprar mercadera como sandalias, zapatos deportivos, zapatilla, shorts entre otros productos que sus clientes les solicitan.
texts.en: Rosalina Alejandra is an entrepreneur who has been successful. Her business is selling general merchandise. This is not the first time that Rosalina has received a loan from Fundacin Len 2000. She tells us that, thanks to the support she has received, she has increased her stock and is able to offer her customers a variety of products. Rosalinda is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as sandals, sports shoes, sneakers, shorts and other products that her customers are requesting.

loan.use: to buy sandals, sports shoes, sneakers, shorts and other products

loan.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: Juan Jos, tiene la edad de 55 aos, est casado y vive con su esposa e hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El va comprar unos terneros para el engorde pues cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotacin de este proyecto en su mejor forma. El tiene como meta generar el mximo de las ganancias para su bienestar familiar y seguir adelante con la responsabilidades de su hogar, el pretende con esos animales poder venderlos y as tener una estabilidad econmica ms estable. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en:
Juan Jos is 55 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children who are his main priority. He will buy calves in order to fatten them, as he has land suitable to carry out this project successfully. His goal is to maximize his profits so he can provide for the well-being of his family and his responsibilities around the home. He believes he can sell these animals and, in doing so, stabilize his finances.
This is the first loan that Juan Jos has received from FUDECOSUR. He had never received loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loan.use: To buy cattle for meat

loan.name: Nancy Pilar

texts.es:
NANCY PILAR tiene 33 aos es soltera, vive con la mam, Tiene una hija. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz, arroz y frejol gandul.
Nancy Briones se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace diez aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de insumos, abonos, urea, fertilizantes,insecticidas. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es comprar una finca.
En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar.
texts.en:
Nancy Pilar is 33 years old, single, and lives with her mother. She has one daughter. They live in La Amrica in Ventanas canton.
This community bank is called "Unidos Venceremos" (Together We Shall Overcome). It is located in La Amrica, in Ventanas canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.
Nancy has been growing corn for ten years. She makes her purchases in Ventanas each month and makes her sales in the market in the same town.
Nancy is requesting this loan to buy fertilizers, urea, manure, and insecticide. The loan money will help her increase her income so she can cover her familys needs and also she will invest some of it in her business. Her dream is to buy a farm.
In her free time Nancy enjoys relaxing.

loan.use: to buy fertilizers, urea, manure, and insecticide

loan.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita, de 27 aos, es una mujer amable y muy buen, trabaja mucho ya que desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su menor hijo de 2 aos, es conviviente con su pareja Ricardo quien tiene 40 aos y con el trabaja mucho para poder salir adelante, vive en casa de sus padres ya que esta en proceso de comprar uno propio. El trabajo de Margarita consiste en el alquiler de una unidad de transporte de cuatro ruedas. Con el transcurrir del tiempo los ahorros que haba guardado durante mucho tiempo, por fin tiene sus frutos, puesto que con ellos pudo comprar el carro que tanto ansiaba. Ahora a puesto a trabajar su vehculo como colectivo en la ciudad de Pucallpa. Gracias a esto sus ingresos han mejorado, ya que anteriormente perciba muy poco dinero de los trabajos eventuales que realizaba. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo como duea del bus, es que le permite viajar constantemente y disfrutar de los paisajes, lleva 3 aos en esta actividad y lo ms difcil para ella es tener que madrugar para cumplir con los horarios de salida, sabe que es duro pero que a la larga le dar muy buenos resultados. Espera en el futuro pueda comprar otro carro y salir adelante trabajando de buena forma. Este ser el crdito nmero 7 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendr un apoyo financiero para poder continuar aumentando su capital de trabajo. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprar algunos repuestos y mandar al taller su vehculo para su revisin semestral.
texts.en:
27-year old Margarita is a good friendly woman who works hard as she wishes to provide a better standard of living for her young son who is two years old. She lives with her 40-year old husband Ricardo and together their goal is to get ahead in life. She lives in her parents house but is in the process of buying a place of her own.
Margarita earns her living by renting out her 4-wheeled vehicle. After a long time she had saved enough money to buy the car she had longed for. Now she runs it as a colectivo (shared taxi) in the town of Pucallpa. As a result her income has increased; beforehand she didnt earn much money from the casual work she was doing.
Margarita really enjoys being the owner of a taxi as she can travel constantly and enjoy the countryside. Shes been doing this work for three years. The most difficult part for her is getting up very early in the morning in order to keep to the schedule. While the work is hard, she knows that in the long-term it will bring positive results.
In the future she would like to buy another vehicle and continue to make progress. This will be her seventh loan with MFP. She is very happy to know that she has financial support to keep expanding her business. With the S/.1000 Margarita is seeking, she will buy spare parts and send her vehicle to the garage for its regular inspection.

loan.use: buy spare parts and have her vehicle serviced

loan.name: Berta Ines

texts.es: La seora Berta Ins se dedica a la elaboracin y venta de comidas como almuerzos y refrigerios a trabajadores de dos empresas del municipio de Envigado localizadas al sur de la cuidad de Medelln, esta labor la inicia con la necesidad de tener un ingreso con el cual cubrir los gastos de su familia puesto que su esposo muri y su hija tiene inconvenientes de salud. La seora Berta Ins requiere para su negocio y la elaboracin de las comidas insumos tales como verduras, condimentos y una olla para cocinar de mayor capacidad. El sueo de la seora Berta Ins es tener su propio restaurante y ver mejoras en la salud de su hija.
texts.en:
Seora Berta Ins makes and sells food such as lunches and light snacks to the workers of the two companies located in the municipality of Envigado, south of the town of Medelln. She started this business when her husband died and she needed to earn money to cover the familys expenses. She also has a daughter with health problems.
Berta Ins needs to buy ingredients such as vegetables, condiments, and larger saucepans in which to cook larger quantities of food. Her dreams are to open her own restaurant and see her daughters health improve.

loan.use: to buy ingredients and large saucepans

loan.name: Heydy Ereydy

texts.es:
Heydy Ereydy tiene 19 aos es soltera, vive con la abuela, no tiene hijos. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz.
Heydy se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz y arroz desde hace tres aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maz y arroz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es tener una casa. Descansar.
texts.en:
Heydy Ereydy is 19 years old and single. She lives with her grandmother and doesn't have any children. She lives in the Amrica district, in Ventanas canton.
The communal bank "UNIDOS VENCEREMOS" ["Together We Will Overcome"] is located in the Amrica district, which is part of Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.
