Heydy has been working in agriculture growing corn and rice for the last three years. She purchases her supplies in Ventanas, and sells her products in the market there.
She is requesting the loan for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice. The loan will help her to increase her income for use by her family and for investment. Her dream is to have a home.
In her spare time, she likes to relax.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loan.name: Griselda

texts.es:
Griselda naci en la ciudad del Cusco (Cusco esta ciudad del sureste del Per ubicada en la vertiente oriental de la Cordillera de los Andes).
Griselda tiene 35 aos edad y es casada y fruto de esta unin tiene un hijo de 13 trece aos, ella alterna sus actividades del hogar con su trabajo, ella trabaja en una empresa de servicio de encomiendas y su cargo es coordinadora de entrega y recepcin de encomiendas, ella trabaja desde las 8 de la maana hasta las 10 de la noche en dos turnos. Ya son 4 aos que trabaja y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que le pone en su trabajo. Griselda en esta oportunidad requiere el prstamo para ahorrar y para uso personal, ella especficamente va usar el credito para la educacin y alimentacin de su hija. Su sueo de Griselda es tener su propio negocio y est pensando abrir una cabina de internet o un multiservicios.
Griselda es integrante del grupo Emprendedores lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco, Per.
texts.en:
Griselda was born in the city of Cusco (Cusco is a city in the south-east of Peru, located in the eastern part of the Andes mountain range).
Griselda is 35 years old and is married; from this marriage she has a 13-year-old child. She combines her household activities with her work; she works for a company that provides parcel service, and her role is coordinator of package delivery and receipt. She works from 8 in the morning until 10 at night, in two shifts. She has been doing this work for four years, and it is going very well for her thanks to the efforts that she puts into her work.
On this occasion Griselda is requesting a loan for savings and personal use. More specifically, she will use the loan for the education and food for her child. Griselda's dream is to have her own business, and she is thinking about opening an internet cabin or a multi-service business.
Griselda is a member of the "Emprendedores" ["Entrepreneurs"] group, which is made up of 12 members who live in the city of Cusco, which is in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco in Peru.

loan.use: for her child's education and food.

loan.name: Banco Mujer Promujer Group

texts.es: Este es un grupo de seoras que ha recibido dos prstamos por parte de Fundacin Mujer, ahora se financiara a dos integrantes del Banco Mujer, Anita y Herminia,quienes van por el segundo nivel de crditos, ambas son vecinias de Paso Canoas, frontera de Costa Rica Panama, y se dedican a la misma actividad de servicios, venta de comidas y golosinas, desde hace varios aos atras; pero no son competencia directa entre si, ya que Herminia tiene su local sobre la calle principal a la aduna y Anita la tiene en una comunidad que se llama Laurel que se ubica a unos 6 kilometros de Paso Canoas. Esta es una fuente importante de generacin de ingresos para la economia domestica, ya que en el caso de Herminia es su nica fuente de ingresos y en el caso de Anita, su compaero es un trabajador subempleado de labores agricolas, quien muchas veces no logra trabajar una semana completa, de all que lo que logra llevar a su casa como salario es variable y con la actividad de Anita se complementa el presupuesto de la familia. Este prstamo se utilizara para reforzar el capital de trabajo de las sodas y se invertira en la compara de refrescos gaseosos, jugos, galletas y bocadillos as como en la compra de materia prima para la elaboracin de los casados, hamburgesas, tacos ete. Las metas a corto plazo es poder contar con recursos economicos, para hacer mejoras a sus viviendas, tanto en sus techos como los pisos.
texts.en: This is a group of women who have received two loans from Fundacion Mujer (Womens Foundation). Now, the organization will fund two of the members of Banco Mujer (Womens Bank), Anita and Herminia, who are in their second loan cycle. Both of the women are neighbors in Paso Canoas, on the border between Costa Rica and Panama, and they have worked in the same business, selling food and candies, for many years. They are not in direct competition with each other since Herminias store is on the main street and Anitas is in a neighborhood called Laurel which is 6 kilometers from Paso Canoas. This is an important source of income generation for their families, as it is Herminias only source of income and Anitas partner is an under-employed farm worker who often cannot work a full week. What he is able to bring home as salary varies, so Anitas work supplements the familys budget. This loan will be used to strengthen the capital earned from selling sodas and will be invested in the purchase of the raw materials to make hamburgers, tacos, etc. The womens short-term goal is to be able to count on their financial resources to make home improvements, both on the roof and floors.

loan.use: buy soft drinks, juices, crackers, and candies.

loan.name: Damarys Eugenia

texts.es:
Damarys Eugenia tiene 35 aos es casada, vive con el esposo e hijos de 9 y 2 aos. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz.
Damarys Briones se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace 15 aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maz y arroz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es tener un terreno propio.
En los tiempos libres se dedica a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Damarys Eugenia is 35 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children who are nine and two. She lives in the Amrica township in the canton of Ventanas.
The communal bank "Unidos Venceremos" [Together We Win] is located in the Amrica township belonging to the Ventanas canton. This bank is dedicated to short-cycle farming, growing corn and rice.
Damarys Briones has devoted herself to growing corn for 15 years. She purchases her supplies in Ventanas and sells her crops in the market there.
The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizer for growing corn and rice. The loan has allowed her to increase her earnings for family consumption and for investment. Her dream is to have her own plot of land.
In her free time she devotes herself to her children.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loan.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal TINKA; El banco est ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Gregoria; ella tiene 58 aos de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de jugos, ella trabaja en el mercado, ella prepara diferentes jugos como jugo de papaya, jugo de naranja, jugo de pltano entre otros jugos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueo de la socia es tener otro local donde pueda vender los jugos. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar frutas como platanos, papayas, naranjas y azcar para que prepare los jugos.
La socia est feliz por el prstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gregoria is a partner in the communal bank "TINKA". The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is located in the province and departments of Cusco.
Gregoria, the partner, is 58 years old and is married with two children. She alternates her daily activities with a business that sells juice. She works in the market where she prepares different juices, such as papaya juice, orange juice, and plaintain juice, among others. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. Through this job, she provides for her children. Her dream is to have another location where she can sell her juices. Gregoria requests the loan to buy fruits (such as plantains, papayas, and oranges) and sugar to prepare the juices.
Gregoria is happy to have received this loan, and she promises to make the payments on her loan.

loan.use: To buy fruits (such as plantains, papayas, and oranges) and sugar to prepare fruit juices.

loan.name: Maria

texts.es: Mara, de 25 aos, es una mujer joven, amable y muy trabajadora, es madre de un nio quien es tiene 5 aos, es conviviente con su pareja Julio de 28 aos quien es el padre de su hijo. Ella a lado de su familia vive en una casa propia en donde comparte la alegra de vivir juntos y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. Mara se dedica a la venta de zapatos y ropa, de manera quincenal o mensual, dependiendo de la demanda de sus productos. Ella trae de la ciudad de Lima gran variedad de mercadera que luego son distribuidos a sus clientes que previamente le han hecho el pedido. Asimismo recorre las calles de la ciudad de Pucallpa, en busca de clientes que deseen comprar alguna prenda. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es vender y est muy feliz cuando logr vender toda la mercadera. Lleva 8 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es transportar los zapatos, ya que las cajas que trae son muy pesadas y la cansan mucho, espera tener con tiempo una tienda de calzados donde pueda vender con mayor comodidad a sus clientes. Este ser el noveno prstamo con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboracin para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez ms en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores crditos que tuvo. Adems le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprar mas zapatos, ropa y otros artculos de uso personal, ya que aumentara su variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Mara, aged 25, is a friendly and very hard-working young women. She is the mother of a 5-year-old child, and lives with her partner Julio, aged 28, who is the father of her son. She lives with her family in their own home, where she shares the joy of living together and being able to have a better quality of life.
Mara works selling shoes and clothing, twice a month or monthly depending on the demand for her products. She brings a large variety of merchandise from the city of Lima, which she then distributes to her customers, who have previously placed orders. She also travels the streets of the city of Pucallpa, looking for customers who might want to purchase some items. What she likes most about her work is selling, and she is very happy when she is able to sell all her merchandise.
She has been doing this work for eight years, and considers the most difficult thing to be transporting the shoes, as the cases which she obtains are very heavy and carrying them is exhausting. She hopes with time to have a shoe store where she can sell to her customers with more comfort.
This will be her ninth loan with MFP, and as such she hopes for your collaboration so she can continue with her goals. For her part, she promises once again to comply with making her repayments, as she did with her previous loans. She is also grateful to be part of the communal bank, because all the members are responsible and very supportive.
With the 2,000 soles requested, she will purchase more shoes, clothing and other items for personal use, so that she can increase the variety of her products for sale.

loan.use: to purchase more clothing, shoes, and personal items.

loan.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: Rigoberto, tiene la edad de 45 aos, est casado y vive con su esposa y 2 hijos que son su mayor prioridad. El con el crdito pretende comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal, el tiene pensado comprar los abonos, herbicidas para mejorar su plantacin. El actualmente cuenta con la plantacin en condiciones regulares y lo que quiere es asistirla para mejorar su prxima cosecha. El tiene como meta generar el mximo de ganancias vendiendo la cosecha para as tener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad econmica de su futuro.Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en: Rigoberto, 45 years old, is married and lives with his wife and 2 children who are his top priority. With the loan, he aims to buy inputs for the care of his coffee. He plans on buying fertilizers and herbicides to improve planting. Now, his planting is in fair condition and what he wants is to improve his next harvest. His goal is to generate maximum profit by selling the crop in order to have a better quality of life and a stable financial future. This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSURE has given him this loan with better facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loan.use: improve his coffee planting.

loan.name: Wilton Cristobal

texts.es:
Wilton Cristobal tiene 23 aos es casado, vive con la esposa y con su hija de 4 aos. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz.
Wilton se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace 10 aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maz y arroz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es comprar un terreno para seguir sembrando.
En los tiempos libres disfruta mucho hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Wilton Cristobal is 23 years old and married. He lives with his wife and his four-year-old daughter in the Amrica district, in Ventanas canton.
The communal bank "UNIDOS VENCEREMOS" ["United We Will Overcome"] is located in the Amrica district, which is part of Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.
Wilton has worked in agriculture growing corn for the last ten years. He purchase his supplies in Ventanas, and sells his products in the market there.
The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice. The loan will help him to increase his income for use by his family and for investment. His dream is to buy a plot of land that he can continue to plant.
In his free time, he really enjoys playing sports.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loan.name: Saira Eveling

texts.es:
Saira Eveling tiene 21 aos es casada, vive con el eposo no tiene hijos. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz.
Saira se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace 4 aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maz y arroz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es comprar una casa.
En el tiempo libre le gusta ver televisin y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Saira Eveling is 21 years old and married. She lives with her husband, and has no children. She lives in the Amrica district, in the Ventanas canton.
The communal bank "UNIDOS VENCEREMOS" ["United We Will Overcome"] is located in the Amrica district, which is part of the Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.
Saira has been working in agriculture growing corn for the last four years. She purchases her supplies in Ventanas, and sells her products in the the market there.
The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice. The loan will help her to increase her income for use by her family and for investment. Her dream is to buy a home.
In her free time, she enjoys watching television and playing sports.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loan.name: Christa

texts.es:
Christa naci en la ciudad del Cusco (Ciudad del sureste del Per ubicada en la vertiente oriental de la Cordillera de los Andes).
Christa tiene 22 aos edad y es soltera, ella estudi la carrera tcnica de computacin e informtica en uno de los ms prestigiosos instituto de la ciudad del Cusco y est trabajando en una empresa privada de envi y recepcin de encomiendas, ella trabaja como digitadora de informacion sube datos a un software. Ya son seis meses que trabaja y le va muy bien. Christa y su hermana Milagros van abrir un pequeo negocio de venta de comida ya tiene todos los implementos de la pollera pero solo les falta dinero para el alquiler del local. Su sueo de Christa es abrir otro negocio de venta de pintura.
Christa es integrante del grupo Emprendedores lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco, Per.
texts.en:
Christa was born in the city of Cusco (a city in southeast Peru, along the eastern slope of the Andes mountain range).
She is 22 years old and unmarried. She studied a technical career in computer science in one of the most prestigious institutes in Cusco. Christa now works in a private company that sends and receives parcels, where she is a typist who inputs data to their software. She has been working at the company for six months, and it is going very well.
Christa and her sister, Milagros, are going to open a small business that sells chicken. She already has everything needed to operate the business, but requires only the money to rent the premises. Christa's dream is to open another business that sells paint.
Christa is part of the group "Emprendedores" ("Entrepreneurs"), which is comprised of 12 partners that live in the city of Cusco, in the province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco, Peru.

loan.use: To rent a premises for her small business.

loan.name: Andrea Clemencia

texts.es:
Andrea Clemencia tiene 40 aos es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 8 y 13 aos. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz.
Andrea se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace 5 aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maz y arroz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es tener una casa propia.
En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y dedicarse a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Andrea Clemencia, 40 years old and married, lives with her husband and children who are 8 and 13. She lives in the America neighborhood in the Ventanas canton. The communal bank United We Win is located in the America neighborhood, belonging to the Ventanas canton, and is dedicated to short-cycle farming corn and rice.
Andrea has worked sowing corn for 5 years. She buys products in Ventanas and sells them at the market.
She requests the loan to buy seeds and fertilizers to sow corn and rice. The loan will help increase income for the familys use and investments. Her dream is to own her own home.
In her free time, Andrew likes to rest and focus on her children.

loan.use: buy seeds and fertilizer to sow corn and rice.

loan.name: Carlos Segundo

texts.es:
Carlos Segundo tiene 42 aos es soltero, vive con los padres. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz.
Carlos se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace 20 aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maz y arroz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es comprar un terreno tener su propia casa.
En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Carlos Segundo is 42 years old and single. He lives with his parents in the Amrica district, in the Ventanas canton.
The communal bank "UNIDOS VENCEREMOS" ["United We Will Overcome"] is located in the Amrica district, which is part of the Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.
Carlos has been working in agriculture growing corn for the last twenty years. He purchases her supplies in Ventanas, and sells his products in the the market there.
The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice. The loan will help him to increase her income for use by his family and for investment. His dream is to buy a plot of land so he can have his own home.
In his free time he likes to play sports.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loan.name: Celso David

texts.es:
Celso David tiene 31 aos es Soltero, vive con los padres no tiene hijos. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz.
Celso se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace 10 aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maz y arroz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es tener una casa.
Le gusta mucho hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Celso David is 31 years old and single. He lives with his parents, and does not have children. He lives in the Amrica district in the Ventanas canton.
The communal bank "UNIDOS VENCEREMOS" ["United We Will Overcome"] is located in the Amrica district, which is part of the Ventanas canton. The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.
Celso has been working in agriculture growing corn for the last ten years. He purchases her supplies in Ventanas, and sells his products in the the market there.
The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice. The loan will help him to increase her income for use by his family and for investment. His dream is to have a house.
He enjoys playing sports.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for growing corn and rice.

loan.name: Miselida

texts.es: Miselida, de 60 aos, es una mujer buena, amable y sobre todo muy trabajadora, esta separada del que fue su conviviente por muchos aos y con quien tuvo cuatro hijos quienes ya son mayores e independientes. Solo su hija Diana de 25 aos vive a su lado en su casa propia que pudo comprar con bastante esfuerzo. El trabajo de Miselida consiste en la venta de comida, desde muy temprano comienza cocinando sus ricos salchipollos (Plato hecho a base de pollo frito y papas fritas) y hamburguesas. Ella disfruta mucho de cocinar y lo hace con mucha habilidad, su comida es comprada por muchos clientes, los cuales acaban con los deliciosos platillos en unos segundos. Desde que comenz a trabajar en esta actividad tuvo un proceso muy largo para poder consolidarse y poder creer como lo hizo hasta ahora, y lo logr y est muy contenta por eso. Para el futuro espera tener un restaurante, donde pueda vender todo el da y con mayor tranquilidad la comida que prepara, porque actualmente solo lo hace por la noches. Aunque tiene 8 aos de experiencia en esta actividad, todava le sigue siendo difcil atender a todos los clientes que tiene. Con todo el esfuerzo que realiza espera poder salir adelante y mejorar su vida. Este ser el crdito nmero 9 con MFP, est muy contenta de saber que tendr un apoyo financiero para poder continuar aumentando su capital de trabajo, adems esta convencida que seguir siendo la socia buena y responsable de los crditos obtenidos anteriormente. Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles, comprar ingredientes, insumos y instrumentos de cocina para preparar sus diferentes platos con los que tiene muy contento a sus comensales.
texts.en:
Miselida, aged 60, is a good woman who is friendly and above all hard-working. She is separated from the man who was her live-in partner for many years, and with whom she has four children who are fully grown and financially independent. Only her daughter Diana, aged 25, lives alongside her in her own home, which she was able to buy with a significant amount of effort.
Miselida's work consists of selling food. She starts cooking her delicious salchipollos (a dish made from fried chicken and french fries) and hamburgers very early in the morning. She very much enjoys cooking and does it with much skill. Her food is purchased by many customers, who end up with their delicious dishes within a few seconds.
Since she started working in this activity, it has been a very big process to get things up and running, and to believe in how things have worked up to now. She has achieved this, and is very happy about it.
In the future, she hopes to have a restaurant where she call sell her food throughout the day and with more ease, because currently she only sells at night-time.
While she has eight years of experience in this activity, she still finds it difficult to serve all her customers. With all the effort that she puts in, she hopes to be able to move ahead and improve her life.
This will be her ninth loan with MFP. She is very happy to know that she will have financial support to be able to continue growing her working capital. In addition, she is convinced that she will continue to be a good member of the bank, and responsible as with the previously obtained loans.
With the 3,000 soles requested, she will purchase ingredients, supplies, and kitchen tools for preparing the different dishes which make her customers happy.

loan.use: to buy ingredients and non-perishable items for preparing her dishes.

loan.name: Pablo Boanerges

texts.es:
Pablo Boanerges tiene 46 aos es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 15 y 18 aos. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz.
Pablo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace 30 aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maz y arroz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es comprar un terreno.
En el tiempo libre le gusta ver televisin y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Pablo Boanerges is 46 years old, married and lives with his wife and children who are 15 and 18. He lives in the Amrica township in the canton of Ventanas.
The communal bank "Unidos Venceremos" [Together We Win] is located in the Amrica township belonging to the Ventanas canton. This bank is dedicated to short-cycle farming, growing corn and rice.
Pablo has devoted himself to growing corn for 30 years. He purchases his supplies in Ventanas and sells his crops in the market there as well.
The requested loan is for the purchase of seeds and fertilizer for growing corn and rice. The loan has allowed him to increase his earnings for family consumption and for investment. His dream is to have his own plot of land.
In his free time he likes to watch television and play sports.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilize for growing corn and rice.

loan.name: Angel Ilario

texts.es:
ngel Ilario tiene 44 aos es casado, vive con la esposa y sus tres de hijos de 20, 17 y 13 aos. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz. ngel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace 16 aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maz y arroz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es tener un terreno para seguir invirtiendo.
En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Angel Ilario is 44 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and his three children, ages 20, 17, and 13. He lives in Recinto America in the Canton of Ventanas.
The group UNIDOS VENCEREMOS ("Together we will Overcome") is located in Recinto America, in the Canton of Ventanas. The group works in the agricultural sector, specifically in the short-cycle harvest of corn and rice.
Angel has been working growing corn for 16 years. He buys his products in Ventanas and sells them in the market there.
He is applying for a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer to sow his corn and rice. The loan will help him to increase his income to help his family and also to reinvest. His dream is to have property in order to continue investing.
In his free time, Angel likes to play sports.

loan.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for his corn and rice crops.

loan.name: Celestino

texts.es: El Sr. Celestino, es una persona emprendedora a la cual le gusta el comercio, es por ello que tiene una tienda de abarrotes que poco a poco a crecido notablemente y debido a la demanda de sus clientes a optado por construir un cuarto mas grande en el cual continuara con su negocio, es por ello que requiere de nuestra ayuda para realizar su proyecto,ve en el crdito la posibilidad de ofrecer a sus clientes mayor comodidad cuando lo visitan as como tambin le permitir generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en: Celestino is a very motivated person who likes business, and because of this, he has a general store that has been growing little by little. Due to the high demand from his clients, Celestino has decided to build a larger room in which he can continue his business. He needs our help to finish the project, and he sees in credit the possibility to offer his clients a more comfortable and convenient experience when they visit him, and in this way, it will allow him to generate more income.

loan.use: to build a larger space for his business.

loan.name: Fanny Patricia

texts.es:
Fanny Patricia tiene 32 aos vive en unin libre, vive con el compaero y sus dos hijos de 10 y 8 aos. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz. Fanny se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace 3 aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maz y arroz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es tener un terreno para seguir invirtiendo.
En el tiempo libre le gusta mucho ver televisin y dedicarse a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Fanny Patricia is 32 years old. She lives with her domestic partner and their two children, ages 10 and 8.She lives in Recinto America in the Canton of Ventanas.
The group UNIDOS VENCEREMOS ("Together we will Overcome") is located in Recinto America, in the Canton of Ventanas. The group works in the agricultural sector, specifically in the short-cycle harvest of corn and rice.
Fanny has been working growing corn for 3 years. She buys her products in Ventanas and sells them in the market there.
She is applying for a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer to sow her corn and rice. The loan will help her to increase her income to help her family and also to reinvest. Her dream is to have property in order to continue investing.
In her free time, Fanny likes to watch television and spend time with her children.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer for her corn and rice crops.

loan.name: Fausto Lenin

texts.es:
Fausto Lenin tiene 18 aos es soltero, vive con los padres no tiene hijos. Vive en el Recinto Amrica en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla UNIDOS VENCEREMOS se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Amrica, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz.
Fausto se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace 3 aos. Compra y vende los productos en Ventanas.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para la siembra del maz y arroz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es tener un terreno y un vehculo para transportar sus productos.
Le gusta mucho ver televisin y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Fausto Lenin is 18 years old. He is single, and he lives with his parents. He does not have any children. He lives in Recinto America in the Canton of Ventanas.
The group UNIDOS VENCEREMOS ("Together we will Overcome") is located in Recinto America, in the Canton of Ventanas. The group works in the agricultural sector, specifically in the short-cycle harvest of corn and rice.
Fausto has been working growing corn for 3 years. He buys and sells his products in Ventanas.
He is applying for a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer to sow his corn and rice. The loan will help him to increase his income to help his family and also to reinvest. His dream is to have property and a vehicle to transport his products.
Fausto likes to watch television and play sports.

loan.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizers for corn and rice crops.

loan.name: Las Hormiguitas Group

texts.es: La alcanca Comunal Las Hormiguitas es un grupo unido que est conformado por 09 socios entre hombres y mujeres la cual lleva trabajando 08 Meses con Edaprospo. La Sra. Julia tiene 50 aos de edad es casada y tiene 04 hijos la cual sigue apoyando a 01 de ellos, ya que est en etapa escolar, en la fotografa se ubicada a lado derecho, ella viste una blusa color fucsia y tiene el cabello corto, esta al costado de la seora que viste un polo negro y pantaln rojo. Hace ms de 25 aos que la Sra. Julia se dedica a la venta de comida, en un local alquilado, gracias a su negocio la Sra. Julia ha podido mejorar su calidad de vida. Con el fin de mejorar su negocio solicito el crdito para la compra de mesas, cubiertos y un horno microonda y de esta manera brindarles una mejor atencin a sus clientes. La Sra. Rosa no pudo estar presente en el desembolso por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en:
The community bank "Las Hormiguitas" ("The Little Ants") is a united group made up of nine members, both men and women, who have been working with the Programa Prosperidad ("Prosperity Program") for eight months. Julia is 50 years old and married with four children, one of whom she continues to support, as he is stil in school. In the photo she is on the right hand side in a fuschia blouse and with short hair; she is at the side of the woman in the black shirt and red pants.
For more than 25 years, Julia has worked selling food from a rented spaces. Thanks to her business, Julia has been able to improve her living space, and she is now buying her own property. Julia's wish is to finish the construction of her home. WIth the goal of improving her business, she is applying for a loan to buy tables, silverware, and a microwave, and in this way, provide her customers with a better experience. The "Las Hormiguitas" community bank are thankful for and dedicated to their working relationship with the Programa Prosperidad. For work-related reasons, Rosa, one member of the group, was not able to be present for the initial distribution of capital (when the photo was taken).

loan.use: para la compra de mesas, cubiertos y un horno microonda.

loan.name: Mario Alberto

texts.es:
Mario Alberto tiene 37 aos de edad, l vive en Ica ,ciudad caracterizada actualmente por el incremento de inversin, no solo en la agroexportaciones, es decir en los fundos, si no tambin, en la apertura de nuevos centros comerciales que brindan muchos puestos de trabajo a pobladores iqueos. En su tiempo libre disfruta construir casas; como bien se sabe el Per se caracteriza por tener las comidas ms deliciosas del mundo y uno de los platos que a Mario Alberto le agrada es Carapulcra con sopa seca. Mario Alberto estudi hasta quinto ao de secundaria y le hubiera gustado estudiar Medicina Veterinaria. El es conviviente y su pareja es ama de casa, juntos tienen 2 hijos el menor de sus hijos tiene 3 aos va a un centro educativo inicial, y su otro hijo tiene 17 aos el cual cursa el quinto ao de secundaria.
El es Maestro constructor dedicado a su trabajo de manera eficiente y responsable, trabaja aproximadamente 9 horas diarias, sus amigos lo entusiasmaron para que trabaje en este tipo de negocio ya que debido al terremoto del ao 2007 aumento la necesidad de contar con maestros constructores. En un da puede atender a un cliente debido a lo complejo de la labor y esto le permite ganar aproximadamente un promedio de S/52 diarios y en un buen da puede ganar S/100 soles lo que le ayuda en algunos gastos adicionales del hogar, su negocio tiene xito porque realiza su labor de manera responsable y con honradez y con ello muchas personas comentan lo buena de su labor y recomiendan su trabajo. Actualmente desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan ayudarlo para poder comprar ms herramientas y con ello brindar un mejor servicio y no tener la necesidad de alquilar las herramientas necesarias, Mario Alberto desea poder pagar en 6 meses el total de su crdito.
Esta mejora podr ayudarle en su labor diaria con herramientas en buen estado y con ello aumentar los ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y as poder ahorrar el dinero suficiente para tener una empresa avcola lo que lo ayudar a cumplir su gran sueo: Tener su propia empresa de construccin."
texts.en:
Mario Alberto is 37 years old. He lives in Ica, a city that has recently had a large increase in investment, not only in agricultural exports - in other words, large farms - but also in the opening of new commercial centers that bring many jobs to regular citizens of Ica. In his free time, Mario Alberto enjoys building houses. Peru is well known for having some of the most delicious foods int he world, and one of the dishes that Mario Alberto enjoys is "carapulcra con sopa seca" (a combination of a pasta dish and a beef or pork stew that are often served together). Mario Alberto studied until the fifth year of secondary school, and he would have liked to have studied veterinary medicine. He lives with his partner, who is the head of the household, and they have two children together. The younger child is three years old and attends an early education center; the older child is 17 years old, and he is in the fifth year of secondary school.
Mario Alberto is a master construction worker, always working efficiently and responsibly. He works about nine hours a day. His friends encouraged him to go into this type of work, and because of the earthquake in 2007, the need for skilled construction workers has increased.In one day, he can attend to one client, and because of the complexity of the labor involved, he is able to earn an average of 52 soles (roughly 20 USD); on a good day, he could early 100 soles (roughly 38 USD), which helps him with a few additional household expenses. His business is successful because he does his work in a responsible and honorable way, and because of this, many people comment on his good work and recommend him to others. Now, Mario Alberto hopes that Kiva lenders can help him to be able to buy more tools, and with these tools offer better service and not have to rent necessary tools. Mario Alberto will repay the loan in six months.
This improvement of having good tools will help him in his daily work, and in this way, he will be able to increase his income to improve his family's quality of life. He would also have enough money to start a poultry business, which would help him accomplish his long-term goal: to have his own construction company.

loan.use: to purchase construction tools.

loan.name: Adriana Maria

texts.es: La seora Adriana Maria a sus 48 aos de edad labor en un restaurante de una amiga por varios aos hasta que su jefe le brindo la oportunidad de trabajar como independiente y es as como desde hace cuatro aos inicio con su propio negocio de venta de productos cosmticos por catlogo. Actualmente y luego de mucho esfuerzo, la seora Adriana es lder de ventas y tiene a su cargo 120 mujeres cabeza de hogar que trabajan como vendedoras. Con el nimo de seguir brindando una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo de 13 aos, la seora Adriana necesita de la compra de productos cosmticos que le faciliten ofrecer a sus clientes crdito y as poder ahorrar para poder cumplir su sueo de tener su propio almacn y brindarle una buena educacin a su hijo.
texts.en:
Adriana Maria is 48 years old. She worked in a friend's restaurant for several years until her boss gave her the opportunity to work independently. So, for years ago, Adriana started her own business selling cosmetic products through catalogs.
After a lot of hard work, Adriana is currently the leader of sales,and she has 120 women homemakers who work for her as salespeople. With the goal of continuing to offer a better quality of life to her 13-year-old son, Adriana is applying for this loan to buy cosmetic products to offer to her clients. This loan will help her save, and eventually, to reach her goals of having her own store and of providing her son with a good education.

loan.use: to purchase assorted cosmetics.

loan.name: Rocio

texts.es: Roco, de 49 aos, es una mujer muy buena, amable y trabajadora, esta separada del que fue su conviviente por muchos aos y con quien tuvo res hijas, de las cuales solo una es menor y aun depende de ella para poder tener educacin y alimentacin. Juntas viven en su casa propia y juntas trabajan mucho a diario para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Roco consiste en la venta de golosinas y otros productos, y que son expuestos en un pequeo tablero frente a un parque muy transitado de su ciudad. Su negocio es muy concurrido por los nios, ya que siempre tiene cosas muy deliciosas para vender, adems que tiene mucha paciencia para atenderlos, motivo por el cual casi siempre acaba con su mercadera. Adems ella preparara algunas cosas ms como maz (pop corn) dulces y salado, lleva frutas y otros productos que las personas siempre desean comer. Esto lo hace ya que aprendi durante todo este tiempo, por lo que hay que tener mucha variedad que ofrecer a los clientes. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite decidir su horario de atencin, lleva 2 aos en esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es tener que permanecer todo el da en su puesto sin poder moverse. Espera con el tiempo juntar el dinero necesario, para poner una tienda de abarrotes. Este ser el sexto prstamo con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboracin para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores crditos que tuvo, adems le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 600 soles, comprar mas golosinas y grutas para as seguir ofreciendo sus productos en variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Rocio is 49 years old. She is a good, friendly, and hardworking woman, separated from her partner of many years with whom she had three daughters. Only one of her daughters is still a minor and depending on Rocio for her education and care. They live in her house and work together every day to be able to have a better quality of life.
Rocio's works selling candy and other products, which are exhibited on a small table in front of a busy park in her city. Her business is very popular with children, as she always has delicious things to sell, and also because she has a lot of patience for serving children. She almost always sells out of her merchandise. In addition to candy, Rocio prepares things like sweet and salty popcorn, and she brings fruit and other products that people always want to eat. She does this because what she has learned during this time is that one should always have a lot of variety to offer to customers.
What Rocio likes most about her work is that it allows her to decide her own schedule. She has been doing this for two years, and she thinks the most difficult part is to stay in one place all day without moving. She hopes that in time she will be able to put together the necessary money to put in a general store.
This will be her sixth loan with MFP, and she is looking forward to the collaboration that will help her continue working toward her goals. She is also determined to make her payments on time, as she did with her past loans. In addition, Rocio is grateful for being part of the communal bank, because all of its members are very responsible and supportive. With the requested amount of 600 soles (~230 USD), she will buy more candy and fruit to continue offering a variety of products to her clients.

loan.use: to buy candy and fruit.

loan.name: San Juan Group

texts.es: El comit de Mujeres de nombre San Juan se conform con 12 integrantes, todas ellas trabajan en forma conjunta y solidaria para comenzar a trabajar con el programa de Comits de Mujeres Emprendedoras. Ellas tienen como objetivo crecer, no solo en lo econmico, sino tambin en lo personal. Una historia muy conmovedora la de la Sra. Avelina que es una seora que siempre tuvo ganas de incursionar en el tema de venta de ropas y ahora pudo cumplir su sueo comercial gracias al programa de la Fundacin Paraguaya, ya que recibi la ayuda y sumado a sus ganas de salir adelante podr progresar y salir adelante. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de prendas, con las cuales podr abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece a la fundacin y a kiva por la oportunidad que estas le dan.
texts.en:
The San Juan Women's Committee is made up of 12 members, and all of them work together and support each other to start working with the Women Entrepreneur Committees Program. Their goal is to grow not only economically, but also personally.
The very moving story of Avelina, one member of the group, is that she always wanted to get into selling clothing, and she is now, thanks to the funding received from the Fundacion Paraguaya program and the motivation it gave her to work hard, she is able to accomplish her commercial dream.
She is applying for a loan to buy clothing, with which she will be able to stock up and keep up with her clients' demand. She is thankful to the foundation and to Kiva for the opportunity that they have given her.

loan.use: to purchase clothing for resale.

loan.name: Monica

texts.es: Mnica, de 34 aos, es una mujer buena y amable, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene tres hijos quienes an son menores y depende de ella y su pareja para poder tener una buena educacin y brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Viven en una casa propia como una familia muy unida y trabajadora. El trabajo de Mnica, consiste en la venta de golosinas. Su puesto est ubicado en su propia casa, negocio que es muy concurrido por sus clientes. Recuerda cuando se inicio y cuales fueron los motivos que le llevaron a entrar a este negocio, ya que necesita ser independiente en algunos gastos, adems de tener que aportar a la economa del hogar. Con el tiempo se decidi y ahora vende bien y esta muy contenta. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y hacerlos rer. Lleva 3 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es tener que vender bajo los fuertes rayos solares de la maana, le encantara tener una tienda de golosinas donde pueda vender con ms comodidad y ofrecer otros tipos de productos a sus clientes. Este ser el crdito nmero 4 con MFP, por tanto esta muy contento de saber que tendr un apoyo financiero, ya que as se sentir seguro de avanzar con su negocio. Adems esta muy comprometido una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores crditos que tuvo, est contento de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos sus integrantes son responsables y muy buenos entre ellos. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprar mas productos de golosinas para ofrecer a sus clientes, adems con la venta de productos de primera necesidad.
texts.en:
Monica, 34 years old, is a good and friendly woman. She lives with her partner, with whom she has three children who are all still young and dependent on her and her partner for a good education and a better quality of life. They live in their own house as a very united and hardworking family. Monica works selling candy from her own home, which is a very popular business. She remembers that when she started, her motives for beginning the business were that she needed to be independent with some expenses, and she also wanted to be able to support her household's finances. With time, she decided on this business, and now her candy is selling well, and she is very happy.
What Monica likes best about her work is talking with her customers and making them laugh. She has been doing this work for three years, and she thinks the most difficult part is having to sell under the strong sun in the morning. She would love to have a candy shop where she could sell her products with more comfort, and offer other types of products to her clients.
This will her fourth loan with MFP, and she is very happy to know that she has financial support, because with this support she feels safe to expand her business. In addition, she is very committed to complete her repayments on time, as she has done in the past, and she happy to belong to her community bank, because all the members are very responsible and good to each other. With the amount requested of 1000 soles, she will buy more candy to offer to her clients, as well as some essential food items to sell.

loan.use: to buy necessary food products and candy.

loan.name: Vanesa

texts.es: Vanesa, de 33 aos, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Henry de 35 aos y sus 2 queridos hijos Rosa de 15 y Jorge de 3 aos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Vanesa posee un trabajo muy lindo, se dedica a la venta de comida, su trabajo esta ubicado en su propia casa, su puesto de comida es muy concurrido por las personas que desean servirse un delicioso platillo nocturno, siendo su especialidad es el los Juanes y el Tacacho (Platillos tpicos de la selva peruana), platillos con los cuales se ha hecho muy conocida entre sus comensales, cuando empez fue solo vendiendo ni la mitad de lo que hace ahora, pero con el tiempo fue implementando y ahora es una gran vendedora que a parte de la buena sazn tiene un trato excelente con sus clientes. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es cocinar, ya que desde muy pequea tuvo esta aficin, lleva 2 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es atender a todos sus clientes al mismo tiempo. Con el tiempo, espera juntar el dinero necesario para poner un restaurante, donde pueda brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Este ser el sexto prstamo con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboracin para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores crditos que tuvo, adems le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles, comprar mas ingredientes e insumos para poder seguir haciendo los platos exquisitos que estn acostumbrados sus clientes, adems de algunos platos y cubiertos que necesita.
texts.en: Vanesa, 33, is a very friendly and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home along with her husband Henry, 35, and her two dear children Rosa who is 15 and Jorge who is three years old, to whom she wishes to offer a better quality of life. Vanesa has a very nice job. She devotes herself to selling prepared foods, work that she does from her own home. Her food stand is very well attended by persons who wish to avail themselves of a delicious night time meal, her specialty being Juanes and Tacacho (traditional foods of the Peruvian rain forest). She has become very well known among her fellow diners for these dishes. When she began she was only selling half of what she sells now, but over time she built up and now is a large seller who not only offers good flavor but excellent treatment to her customers. What she enjoys most about her work is cooking, as she was a fan of cooking from a very early age. She's had this business two years and believes the most difficult part is waiting on all her customers at the same time. Over time she hopes to raise enough money to set up a restaurant where she may offer better service to her customers. This will be her sixth loan with MFP and so she hopes for your collaboration so she may keep pursuing her objectives. At the same time she commits once again to making the payments as with her previous loans. In addition she is pleased to be part of her communal bank because all the members are responsible persons who support each other a lot. With the requested amount of 3,000 Peruvian soles she will purchase more ingredients and supplies for making more of the exquisite dishes her customers are used to having, as well as some items of dishware and table settings that she needs.

loan.use: to purchase supplies for preparing food.

loan.name: 4 De Octubre Group

texts.es: El comit "4 De Octubre" est en el tercer ciclo del programa, est integrada por 9 seoras, quienes se esfuerzan al maximo para poder lograr sus metas. El objetivo de cada una de ella es seguir en el comit, fomentar el espritu solidario y mantener la unidad en el grupo. Mediante la oportunidad brindada por la fundacin paraguaya pudieron aumentar sus actividades algunas iniciarla. Una de las miembros es la seora Edita, quien gracias a su esfuerzo y a su trabajo puede ayudar a su familia y mantener la casa. Ella nos cuenta que se dedica a la venta de pollos, en lo cual le va muy bien, pues los pollos son muy pedidos ya que la carne est muy cara. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de pollos en cantidad, con lo cual podr abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece por esta oportunidad que se le da.
texts.en:
The group Octoer 4 is in their third loan cycle and consists of 9 women who try their best to achieve their goals. Each woman strives to continue on the committee, encourage a spirit of solidarity, and maintain unity in the group. Through the opportunity provided by the Paraguayan foundation, they were able to increase their business and initiatives.
One of the members is Edita who, thanks to her effort and hard work, is able to help her family and maintain the house. She tells us that she sells chicken and does very well, since her chicken are in high demand because meat is very expensive. She requests the loan to buy chicken in quantity, with which she will be able to meet her clients demand. She is appreciative for this opportunity.

loan.use: buy chicken for sale.

loan.name: Dios Proveera 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Yovany is a member of the group called Dios Proveera 1, 2 & 3 ("God Will Provide"). This group is located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, a city formed by the sugar cane industry (the city's main economic activity) and by luxury tourism with high scale resorts. Yovany is one of many women whose husband or other family member depends on work in the sugarcane industry. They live in a Batey, a rural area where most of the sugar cane workers live.
Yovany is excited to be taking her seventh loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and expanded her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her retail business. She will buy clothing, shoes, and cosmetics (like perfume, body lotion, etc.) Profits will be used to reinvest in her business. She wants to make big sales this Christmas and continue saving for her goals of having a permanent place for her business and to buy a home.
She currently makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their three children. She thanks you for your support.

loan.use: to buy clothes, cosmetics, etc. for resale

loan.name: Muurya

texts.en: Muurya lives in Mombasa, Kenya. He is single and is a hawker; a business he has run for the last five years. He learned of Milango from his friends and joined in order to access credit. Muurya is applying for a loan of Ksh 80,000 to purchase hair clips, braids, make up kits and other ladies accessories. He looks forward to owning a stall despite the challenges of price fluctuations.

loan.use: To purchase hair clips, braids, make up kits and other ladies accessories.

loan.name: Madres Trabajaddoras Group

texts.es: El comit Madres trabajadoras es de la ciudad de Asuncin, est integrado por 17 mujeres. Ellas son personas muy trabajadoras y luchadoras que tienen como objetivo principal la ayuda a sus familias y mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Todas ellas son mujeres jefas de familia, que tienen sobre sus hombros toda la responsabilidad. Una de esas mujeres luchadoras es Liz, quien nos cuenta que es modista, y que gracias a este trabajo ella puede ayudar con los gastos de la casa. Ella se considera muy capaz de sobresalir con su trabajo y con la ayuda de sus compaeras del grupo. Ella solicita el crdito para comprar telas, hilos, botones, cierres y dems insumos que necesita para su taller, ya que tiene varios pedidos y le gustara poder cumplir con ellos.
texts.en: The group Working Mothers is from the city of Asuncion and consists of 17 women. They are hard working and fighting women who all have the same goal to help their families and improve their living conditions. All of them are female heads of household who bear all the responsibility on their shoulders. One of the fighting women is Liz, who is a dressmaker. Thanks to this work, she is able to help with household expenses. She considers herself very capable of excelling in her work with the help of her friends from the group. She requests the loan to buy fabrics, threads, buttons, zippers, and other supplies she needs for her shop, as she has many orders and would like to be able to meet them.

loan.use: buy fabrics, threads, zippers and other supplies.

loan.name: Bendicion Group

texts.es: El comit Bendicion nace mediante la gestin y el apoyo de un grupo de mujeres que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar. Este comit es de la Ciudad San Lorenzo, las integrantes del comit fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas en lo personal como tambin en lo econmico. La Sra. Elisa es una de estas mujeres emprendedoras, ella comenta que tiene una despensa, la cual es bien surtida, con esta despensa ella surte a sus vecinos. Comenta que tiene muy buenas ventas ya que gracias al tiempo que lleva en esto ya tiene una clientela bien definida. Su meta es seguir creciendo y ampliar su local. Elisa solicita el crdito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, lcteos, panificados y dems insumos, con los cuales podr abastecerse y cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en: The committee Blessings was born through the management and support of a group of working women. The group is from the city of San Lorenzo, and the members main goal is that each woman grows personally and financially. Elisa is one of the entrepreneurial women who has a well-stocked shop that serves her neighbors. She has good sales because she has been doing this for a long time and has a well-defined client base. Her goal is to continue expanding her business. She requests the loan to buy food, drinks, milk, bread, and other supplies with which she will stock her store and meet her customers demands.

loan.use: buy food, drinks, milk, bread, and other supplies.

loan.name: Estrellas Celestes Group

texts.es:
La A.C. ESTRELLAS CELESTES iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Collpani, est compuesta por ocho integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Mara. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de muebles, promotor de venta, confeccin de sacos y chalecos, tejido de macram, confeccin de chompas, comercio, venta de ropa, venta de ropa usada.
La seora Mara, indica que es la primera vez que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institucin por invitacin de promotores. En la actualidad ella tiene un elaboracin de muebles (carpintera) que viene trabajando hace aos, aprendiendo el mismo de su padre.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de madera) que comprara de las barracas y posteriormente a la elaboracin lo vender en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es separada y tiene dos hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la recuperacin y el rea de salud.
texts.en:
The Estrellas Celestes (Celestial Stars) communal bank will start its first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Collpani focal center. It has 8 members led by a governing board headed by Mara. The members are engaged in a variety of business activities among which we have: furniture sales, sales agent, coat and vest making, macram weaving, sweater making, commerce, clothes sales and used clothes sales.
Mara indicates that this is the first time shes worked in Pro Mujer and that she joined the institution thanks to an invitation from one of the promoters. She currently manufactures furniture (carpentry shop), a business shes had for years having learned from her father.
The loan shell take out now is to increase her capital. She will buy lumber in the stands and once the furniture is made shell sell it in her sales space. This way of working allows her to generate resources to support her family since shes separated and has two children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the recuperation and the health services.

loan.use: to buy lumber.

loan.name: Leslie Marcela

texts.es:
Leslie es una mujer relativamente joven, tiene 34 aos, vive con su esposo y su hija de 11 aos.
Ella inici sus estudios universitarios en Administracin de Empresas, pero por sus obligaciones familiares tuvo que suspender. Pero espera continuarlos a corto plazo.
Ella siempre trabaj como asalariada, pero el querer estar con su hija la hace renunciar .
Como siempre le ha gustado tener independencia econmica, hace unos cursos de capacitacin, para aprender a cortar cabello, aplicar tintes y otros qumicos, hacer manicure y pedicure como forma de genar ingresos ,que le permiten independencia y apoyar con los gastos de su familia.
Ella en este momento ofrece servicios de estilista a domicilio a mujeres,que se lo solicitan.Lo organiza por citas previas, preferiblemente durante el tiempo que su hija est en la escuela , durante las maanas y hasta como al medio da. En las tardes atiende a su hija y las labores domsticas.
Este crdito es importante para ella y el desarrollo de su negocio, porque puede afiliarse a las casa proveedoras de productos logrando descuentos y contar con inventario disponible de productos lo que le dar mejores precios y mayor liquidez. Su meta es lograr un negocio estable y competitivo.
texts.en:
Leslie is a relatively young woman; shes 34 years old. She lives with her husband and 11-year-old daughter. She started studying Business Administration in university but due to family obligations had to drop out but she expects to restart her studies soon. She always worked as a salaried employee but because she wanted to stay home with her daughter she resigned.
Because shes always enjoyed being economically independent she took some courses to learn how to cut and color hair and how to apply other chemicals and how to do manicures and pedicures as a way of earning income that will allow her to be independent and help with family expenses.
At present, she provides styling services at her customers homes to women who request them. She organizes them based on prior appointments preferably during the time her daughter is at school during the mornings and up to about noon. In the afternoon she tends to her daughter and her household chores.
This loan is important for her and for her business development because she wants to affiliate herself with a firm that distributes the products so that she can qualify for discounts and have product inventory on hand which will mean better prices and more liquidity. Her goal is to attain a stable, competitive business.

loan.use: to buy beauty supplies.

loan.name: Ana Mariela

texts.es: La seorita Ana se dedica al negocio de venta de comida, hace 4 aos atrs y este mismo fue heredado de sus padres quienes son de la tercera edad y ya no salen a su negocio, vende por las noches en una d las calles mas concurridas de la ciudad de Cochabamba y estudia en el da, tiene una labor muy sacrificada ya que con la venta de comida se paga sus estudios y alimentacin y tambin ayuda a su padres con los gastos dl hogar, se levanta desde muy tempranas horas de la maana para preparar sus alimentos para despus ir a sus clases, El crdito lo necesita para cambiar sus utensilios e incrementar sus inventarios en cuanto a insumos se refiere. La casa es de sus padres, la seorita Ana es una persona muy amable y joven que se esfuerza mucho para tener un futuro mejor.
texts.en: Ana has sold food for four years, a business she inherited from her parents who are senior citizens and no longer work in their business. She sells at night in one of Cochabambas busiest streets and studies during the day. Her work is very demanding but she uses her profits to pay for her schooling and food and also to help her parents with household expenses. She rises very early in the morning to prepare the food and then go to class. She needs the loan to replace her utensils and increase inventory with respect to supplies. The house belongs to her parents. Ana is a very kind young woman who strives to have a better future.

loan.use: to buy new dishes, pots and supplies.

loan.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es: Este grupo surgi por contacto de una de las integrantes con la fundacin, el grupo se encuentra en el tercer ciclo, opera con la Fundacin desde este ao. Ellas son mujeres que se esfuerzan al mximo para poder ayudar a sus familias por medio del trabajo en equipo. Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Felipa, ella se dedica a la fabricacin y venta de termos forrados en cuero y tambin hace trabajos de manicura a domicilio. Ella nos cuenta que gracias a su sacrificio, sumado a su trabajo y a la ayuda de su grupo puede salir adelante y generar los ingresos que necesita para aportar en su casa. Su meta es crecer como comerciante y de esa forma seguir ayudando a su familia. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de termos para ser forrados y tambin cuero. Ella agradece por la oportunidad que se le est dando.
texts.en:
This group arose from a contact between one of the members and the Fundacin. The group is in its third cycle and operates with the Fundacin since this year. They are women who strive to the maximum to help their families through their teamwork.
One of the members of the group is Felipa. She makes and sells leather covered thermoses and also provides in-home manicure services. She tells us that thanks to her sacrifice added to her work and the help from the group shes able to get ahead and generate income she needs to contribute to her household. Her goal is to grow as a merchant and continue to help her family this way.
Shes asking for the loan to buy thermoses to be covered and also to buy leather. She is grateful for the opportunity shes being given.

loan.use: to buy thermoses and leather.

loan.name: Los Alamos Group

texts.es:
La A.C. LOS ALAMOS iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Alto Lima, est compuesta por seis integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Gabriela. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: elaboracin de chompas, tejido y venta de chompas, venta de ropa, venta de cosmticos.
La seora Gabriela, indica que es la primera vez que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institucin por invitacin de la promocin. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido de chompas que viene trabajando hace aos, aprendiendo el mismo de sus padres.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de lana) que adquirir de la tienda distribuidora y posteriormente a la elaboracin lo vender en a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
The Los Alamos communal bank will start its first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Alto Lima focal center. It has 6 members led by a governing board headed by Gabriela. The members of the communal bank are engaged in a variety of businesses among which we have: sweater making, weaving and selling sweaters, clothes sales and cosmetics sales.
Gabriela indicates that this is the first time shes worked in Pro Mujer and that she joined the institution thanks to an invitation from a promotion. She currently works making sweaters, a business shes had for years having learned it from her parents.
The loan shell take out now is to increase her capital. She will buy wool from the distributor and once her items are made will sell them based on prior orders. This way of working allows her to generate income to support her family.

loan.use: to buy wool.

loan.name: Luciana

texts.es: Luciana es una mujer joven, separada, tiene dos hijos adolescentes. Ella tiene una peluquera con buena clientela, adems de eso se dedica a la venta de ropa entre los clientes que se acercan hasta su peluquera. Ella compra las ropas de Argentina y el Brasil viajando semanalmente a esos lugares. Comenta que se inicio con un dinero que junto con otros trabajos anteriores, mes a mes va aumentando su negocio con su trabajo de peluquera y las ropas que vende. Ella es una persona muy responsable y con ganas de superacin, tiene un espritu jovial y emprendedor que no cabe duda que va a llegar a conseguir todas las metas que se ha propuesto. Solicita el crdito para la refaccin de su peluquera, ya que este es su medio de trabajo y le gustara poder ofrecer una mayor comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Luciana is a young woman. Shes separated and has two adolescent children. She has a beauty salon with a good clientele. She also sells clothes to the customers that come to the beauty salon.
She buys clothes in Argentina and Brazil traveling weekly to those places. She comments that she started out with money she saved from previous jobs. Her businesses, both the beauty salon and the clothes sales, grow every month. She is a very responsible person who wants to get ahead. She has a jovial, enterprising spirit and without a doubt she will reach all the goals shes set for herself.
She is asking for the loan to do some improvements to her beauty salon since this is her source of employment and shed like to make it more comfortable for her customers.

loan.use: to make improvements to her beauty salon.

loan.name: Lourdes Del Pilar

texts.es:
Lourdes naci en la ciudad de Lima pero actualmente vive en la ciudad del Cusco (Ciudad del sureste del Per ubicada en la vertiente oriental de la Cordillera de los Andes).
Lourdes tiene 35 aos edad y es madre y padre par sus dos hijos, ella alterna sus actividades del hogar con su trabajo, ella trabaja en una empresa de servicio de encomiendas y su cargo es coordinadora de entrega y recepcin de encomiendas, ella trabaja desde las 8 de la maana hasta las 10 de la noche en dos turnos. Ya son dos aos que trabaja y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que le pone en su trabajo. Lourdes en esta oportunidad requiere el prstamo para pagar una deuda y para uso personal sea va comprar regalos de navidad para sus hijos. Su sueo de Lourdes es tener una casa propia y una empresa propia.
Lourdes es integrante del grupo Emprendedores lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco, Per.
texts.en:
Lourdes was born in the city of Lima but currently lives in the city of Cusco (a city in southeast Per located on the eastern slopes of the Andes Mountains).
Lourdes is 35 years old and both mother and father of her two children. She alternates her household chores with her job. She works in a package shipping firm as shipping and receiving coordinator. She works from 8am until 10pm in two shifts. Shes had this job for two years now and does very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. Lourdes on this occasion needs the loan to pay off a debt and for personal use, that is, to buy Christmas gifts for her children. Lourdes dream is to own a house and business of her own.
Lourdes belongs to the Emprendedores group which has 12 members who live in the city of Cusco, Cusco Province and Department, Per.

loan.use: to buy Christmas gifts for her children.

loan.name: Osmar

texts.es: El Sr. Osmar es de ciudad del este, est casado, tiene dos hijos, quienes estn todava en edad escolar. l se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad, a la vez tambin se dedica a la venta de joyas de forma ambulante por las colonias, la misma cada vez ms est en ascenso, generndole un buen ingreso. Con la ayuda de su esposa estn saliendo adelante con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo. El nos cuenta que todo el trabajo que el y su esposa hacen es por darle a sus todo lo mejor, pues desean darle un futuro mejor, sin privaciones como las que ellos tuvieron que pasar. El solicita el crdito para la compra de joyas, como ser anillos, cadenas, pulseras y dems tipos, con los cuales podr abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Osmar is from Ciudad del Este. Hes married and has two children who are still school age. He sells basic staple items but also sometimes sells jewelry in an itinerant manner throughout the neighborhoods, a business thats currently growing and generating good income. With help from his wife they are getting ahead with much sacrifice and effort.
He tells us that all the work he and his wife do is to provide the best because they want to give them a better future without the privations they had to undergo.
He is asking for the loan to buy jewelry like rings, chains, bracelets and other types to stock up and meet customer demand.

loan.use: to buy assorted jewelry.

loan.name: Las Palomitas Group

texts.es: La Alcanca Comunal Las Palomitas est conformada por 08 integrantes dedicadas a distintas actividades comerciales. Emilia tiene 69 aos de edad es viuda y tiene 05 hijos independientes. Emilia lleva 05 aos dedicndose a la venta de gaseosas y dulces, la cual los ofrece en su domicilio, negocio que con mucho esfuerzo ha llegado a mejorarlo, ya que en la actualidad tambin ofrece carteras la cual son elaboradas por ella misma, gracias a dichas actividades Emilia a podido mejorar su vivienda y cubrir sus gastos personales. En esta oportunidad solicito el prstamo para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio comprando bebidas como gaseosas, agua, y golosinas como galletas, caramelos y chocolates, y de esta manera tener surtida su kiosco. El deseo de Emilia es de seguir mejorando su negocio. La Alcanca Comunal Las Palomitas estn muy agradecidos con el crdito brindado ya que hacen posible su progreso. Emilia es la que viste una casaca azul y pantaln negro y lleva el cabello corto, ella est ubicada al lado izquierdo. Eduardo no pudo asistir por motivo de estudios, ya que esta en exmenes finales.
texts.en:
The Las Palomitas (Little Doves) communal bank has 8 members involved in a variety of commercial activities. Emilia is 69 years old and a widow; she has five independent children. Emilia has been selling soft-drinks and candy for five years at home, a business that shes managed to improve with much effort since she now also sells purses that she makes herself. Thanks to these activities, Emilia has managed to do some home improvements and cover personal expenses.
On this occasion, she asked for the loan to continue investing in her business purchasing beverages like soft-drinks and water and snacks like cookies, candy and chocolates to stock her kiosk. Emilias wish is to continue improving her business.
The Las Palomitas communal bank is very grateful for the loan provided because it makes their progress possible. Emilia is wearing the blue jacket and black pants; her hair is short and shes on the left side. Eduardo was unable to attend because of school since hes in final exams now.

loan.use: to buy soft-drinks, water, cookies, candy and chocolates.

loan.name: Zoila

texts.es: Zoila, de 50 aos, es una mujer alegre, amable y muy trabajadora, esta casada con Jorge quien tiene 52 aos y tienen dos hijos de 16 y 9 aos, ellos comparten sus das y la alegra de educar a sus hijas, viven en una casa propia desde donde trabaja mucho para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Zoila trabaja en un sector muy concurrido, tiene una negocio muy bueno y que le brinda muchas posibilidades, su negocio funciona en su propia casa, tiene un puesto de comida donde vende sus deliciosos platillos, el aroma que sale de sus ricos potajes es suficiente para atraer a los clientes, su puesto es muy concurrido y por lo general vende mucho durante toda la noche, tiene 32 aos en este negocio, el cual le a dado el dinero necesario para alimentar a sus hijas y pagar sus estudios, pero siente que ms adelante va a tener ms gastos y el dinero le va a faltar, por eso desea poner un restaurante, donde pueda vender con ms comodidad sus sabrosos platos y as mejorar su ingresos econmicos, se super mucho desde que comenz y sabe que trabajando poco a poco se puede lograr grandes cosas. A ella le gusta conversar con sus clientes, disfruta mucho hacindolo, pero le es muy difcil atender a todas las personas que concurren a su puesto, pero igual no decae en su afn de salir adelante y esta dispuesta a trabajar mucho para lograrlo.
