Este ser el octavo prstamo con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboracin para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores crditos que tuvo, adems le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles, comprar ingredientes para continuar con la preparacin de sus platos, adems de algunos utensilios de cocina que le hacen falta para poder continuar con su labor.
texts.en:
Zoila, 50, is a cheerful, kind, very hardworking woman. Shes married to Jorge, 52, and they have two children who are 16 and 9 years old. They share their days and the joy of educating their daughters. They live in their own house where she works hard to provide a better quality of life for her family.
Zoila works in a very busy sector. She has a very good business that provides many possibilities. Her business operates in her home. She has a food stand where she sells her delicious meals. The aroma from her delicious stews is enough to attract customers. Her stand is very popular and in general she sells much during the night. Shes been in this business for 32 years and its given her money to feed her daughters and pay for their schooling. But, she feels that later on shell have more expenses and money will be insufficient. This is why she wants to open a restaurant to sell her delicious dishes more comfortably and thus improve her income. Shes improved quite a bit since she started and she knows that by working its possible to gradually reach great things.
She enjoys chatting with her customers; she enjoys it very much but its difficult to tend to all the people who come to her stand but even so she does not falter in her eagerness to get ahead and is willing to work hard to accomplish it.
This will be her 8th MFP loan so shes hoping for your collaboration to continue with her objectives; she commits once again to make her installment payments like shes done with previous loans. It pleases her to be part of her communal bank because all its members are responsible and very supportive people. She will use the requested 3000 soles to buy ingredients to continue making her delicious meals and will also buy some kitchen utensils she needs to be able to continue with her work.

loan.use: to buy food preparation ingredients and kitchen utensils.

loan.name: Angela Maricel

texts.es: La seora ngela a sus 34 aos de edad se dedica a la venta de tiles escolares y productos de papelera en un pequeo local que acondicion con los pocos ahorros que tena en la sala de su casa hace aproximadamente un ao cuando vio esta necesidad en los habitantes de la vereda en la cual vive. Desde entonces a beneficiado a toda una comunidad la cual antes tenia que hacer un recorrido de 2 horas para poder conseguir lo que necesitaban. Con el nimo de seguir brindando comodidad y buen servicio a su comunidad, la seora ngela necesita de la compra de surtido de tiles escolares con los que pueda complementar su papelera y seguir siendo una lder positiva en su comunidad.
texts.en: ngela is 34 years old. Her business is selling school supplies and stationery products from small premises that she fitted out in her living room, with a small amount of savings that she had. She started her business approximately one year ago when she saw the need that existed among the people living in her district. Since then, her business has benefited an entire community who used to have to travel for two hours to get what they needed. With the aim of continuing to provide convenience and good service to her community, ngela needs to buy a stock of school supplies which she can use to complement her stationery products and continue being a positive leader in her community.

loan.use: to buy school supplies

loan.name: Danilo

texts.es:
Danilo naci en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo (Sitio arqueolgico incaico, capital del Distrito de Ollantaytambo (Provincia de Urubamba), situado al sur del Per, a unos 90 km al noroeste de la ciudad del Cuzco.).
Danilo tiene 20 aos edad y es soltero, l trabaja como cheff en uno de los restaurantes ms visitados por los turistas en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo. Ya es un ao que se dedica a este trabajo y le va muy bien. Danilo y su mama tiene un negocio familiar de venta de productos de primera necesidad en un local alquilado. En esta oportunidad Danilo requiere el prstamo para comprar ms mercadera como por ejemplo arroz, azcar y otras cosas ms.
Danilo es integrante del grupo Siempre Adelante lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo y donde realizan sus actividades econmicas.
texts.en:
Danilo was born in the city of Ollantaytambo (an Incan archaeological site in the capital of the district of Ollantaytambo in the province of Urubamba) located in southern Peru 90 kilometers northeast of Cusco.
Danilo is 20 years old and single. He works as a chef in one of the restaurants most visited by tourists in Ollantaytambo. He has been working here for a year and doing well. Danilo and his mother have a small family business selling basic foodstuffs in a shop they rent. For this opportunity, Danilo requests the loan to buy merchandise like rice, sugar, and other things.
Danilo is a member of the group Always Moving Forward which consists of 12 partners from the city of Ollantaytambo where they work.

loan.use: buy more merchandise like rice, sugar, and other things.

loan.name: Cinthia's Group

texts.es:
Cinthia's group es una sociedad de tres mujeres emprendedoras que anhelan que sus negocios crezcan para seguir triunfando en la vida. En este grupo la presidenta es Cinthia porque es una mujer trabajadora, sociable, colaboradora y responsable en sus actividades.
Cinthia tiene 28 aos, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos en la ciudad de Ibarra, en la provincia de Imbabura. Trabaja en la compra venta de ropa, negocio que le ayuda a sustentar los gastos familiares, pero tiene la necesidad de incrementar sus ventas, es por eso que realiza su primer crdito en Fodemi debido a que va a invertir en la compra de mercadera como camisetas, sacos, pantalones, calentadores porque las ventas suben en temporada navidea y le generar ms ingresos.
Al igual que Cinthia las otras personas desean triunfar en la vida para mejorar la calidad de vida de ellas y de sus familiares.
texts.en:
Cinthia's Group is comprised of three women entrepreneurs who want to expand their businesses so they can continue being successful in life. The president of the group is Cinthia because she is a hard-worker, sociable, collaborative and responsible in her activities.
Cinthia, 28, lives with her husband and their three children in the city of Ibarra in the province of Imbabura. She sells clothing for a living and contributes her income to the household for expenses. She wants to increase her sales volume and has requested her first loan through Fodemi. She plans to use the loan to buy t-shirts, suits, trousers and legwarmers because of the higher demand at Christmas time. This will increase her income.
Just like Cinthia, the other members also wish to lead a successful life and improve their families' quality of life.

loan.use: To buy merchandise such as t-shirts, suits, trousers, and legwarmers for the Christmas season demand.

loan.name: Deidy

texts.es: Deidy, de 47 aos, es una mujer amable, buena y trabajadora, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene tres hijos de 20, 14 y 12 aos y a quienes desean brindar una mejor calidad de vida, vive en su casa de su madre en donde tambin viven sus tres hermanos y su conviviente. EL trabajo de Deidy consiste en la venta de comida, tiene un negocio muy bueno que le agrada mucho, ya que siempre tiene clientes cuando sale a la vereda de su casa en espera de sus fieles clientes que van en busca de los platos ms deliciosos que son su especialidad. Entre los platos que vente ofrece son patashca, Juanes, tacacho, asados de pescado, entre otros. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 1 ao y le permite poder generar buenos ingresos a su hogar ya que antes de tener este empleo tena que esperar los ingresos de su conviviente y a veces no alcanzaba para todos los gastos. Ahora tiene un ingreso adicional y adems le permite poder tener alimento a disposicin para su familia ya que no gastan ni en cena ni desayuno. Le gusta mucho lo que hace ya que siempre le ha fascinado la cocina, tiene muchos planes con su negocio pero por el momento solo desea juntar mayor capital y mas adelante hacerlo crecer implementndolo mejor. Este ser el crdito nmero 3 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboracin para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado ella se compromete a seguir siendo una socia puntual y cumplida como en los crditos anteriores que tuvo, adems desea seguir trabajando con los socios de su banco comunal ya que todos son muy amables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprar ingredientes e insumos para poder seguir con su trabajo, adems comprar utensilios.
texts.en:
Deidy, 47, is a kind, good-hearted, hard-working woman who has a common-law husband and three children, ages 20, 14 and 12 for whom she wants the best quality of life. She lives in her mother's house, where her three siblings and partners also live. Deidy has a very good food business which she enjoys because when she goes out on the porch her loyal customers are waiting to buy her delicious specialties. Among the dishes she makes are patashca (fish and herbs), Juanes (rice and spice tamales), tacacho (smashed yucca and plantain), baked fish and others. She has been in business for a year and has earned a good income for her household. Before having this job she was always dependant on her husband's income and sometimes it was not enough to cover expenses. Now she has extra income which allows her to have food on the table since they do not have to pay for breakfast or dinner.
She enjoys what she does because she especially likes cooking. She has many plans for the business but for now only wants to save capital and use it to expand in the future. This is her third loan through MFP and she is counting on your support so she can meet her goals.
She is committed to paying back the loan on time as she has done with the previous loans. She also wants to continue with the communal bank she is in because the members are kind and supportive. She plans to use the 1,500 PEN to buy ingredients, supplies and utensils to continue with her work.

loan.use: To buy cooking products, supplies en utensils.

loan.name: Sartasiani Group

texts.es:
La A.C. SARTASIANI iniciar su sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Collpani, est compuesta por nueve integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Antonia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: punto viva, venta de utensilios de limpieza, centro de llamadas, carnicera, tienda, venta de detergentes, venta de abarrotes.
La seora Antonia, indica que es el tercer ao que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institucin por invitacin de su hija. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio que viene trabajando hace aos, aprendiendo el mismo de su madre.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de conservas) que comprara de la Ceja, de las mayoristas y posteriormente a la elaboracin lo vender en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene seis hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros y los intereses.
texts.en:
The comunal bank "SARTASIANI" is beginning its sixth cycle in the Pro Mujer program at the Collpani social center. The group is comprised of nine members and its board of directors is chaired by Mrs. Antonia. The members of the group run different businesses, among which are: cell phone sales, cleaning utensils sales, telephone calling service, butcher, store, detergent sales and grocery sales.
Mrs. Antonia has participated in Pro Mujer for three years and joined the institution by invitation from her daughter. Currently she runs a neighborhood store that she began several years ago, having learned the trade from her mother.
The loan she has requested is to increase her working capital to buy canned goods from wholesale dealers at La Ceja. She will then sell them at her store. This will allow her to generate more income to support her family. She is married and has six children.
When asked what she enjoys most about Pro Mujer, she says it is the savings and interest rate.

loan.use: To buy canned goods.

loan.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es: El comit se Denomina Nueva Esperanza estn en el Sptimo Ciclo con 15 integrantes, es un grupo que se destaca en el barrio por ser muy unidas solidarias y responsable, adems de eso son mujeres trabajadoras, quienes se esfuerzan al mximo por poder ayudar a sus familias. Tomasa es una de esas mujeres, ella nos comenta que para ella lo ms importante es darle a su familia todo lo que necesitan para que tengan una vida digna y decorosa. Ella se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo, comenta que tiene muy buena venta, ya que debido al tiempo que lleva en esto ya pudo formarse muy buena clientela. Ella solicita el crdito para la compra de prendas de verano, con lo cual podr abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece a la fundacin y a kiva por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Nueva Esperanza" is in its seventh cycle and comprised of 15 members. The group is known in its neighborhood for being very united, supportive and responsible. The members are hard-working women who make the maximum effort to help their families.
Tomasa is one of the members. She says the most important thing for her is to give her family everything they need to lead a decent, dignified lifestyle. She sells all kinds of clothing and claims to have developed a solid customer base in the time she has been in business so she has a high sales volume.
She is requesting a loan to buy summer clothing to meet customer demand. She is grateful to the Fundacin and Kiva for this opportunity.

loan.use: To buy summer clothing to sell.

loan.name: Lisbeth Vanesa

texts.es:
Lisbeth naci en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo (Sitio arqueolgico incaico, capital del Distrito de Ollantaytambo (Provincia de Urubamba), situado al sur del Per, a unos 90 km al noroeste de la ciudad del Cuzco.).
Lisbeth tiene 26 aos edad y es soltera, ella trabaja como gua oficial de turismo y trabaja para diferentes agencias de viajes que tiene un prestigio internacional y nacional. Ya son cuatro aos que ejerce su profesin y le va muy bien. Lisbeth y su mama Lidia tiene un pequeo negocio familiar que consiste en la venta de gaseosas, aguas, dulces y otras cosas en la estacin de trenes de la ciudad de Ollantaytambo. En esta oportunidad Lisbeth requiere el prstamo para comprar ms mercadera como por ejemplo gaseosa, agua y otras cosas ms.
Lisbeth es integrante del grupo Siempre Adelante lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo y donde realizan sus actividades econmicas.
texts.en:
Lisbeth was born in the city of Ollantaytambo (an Inca archaeological site, capital of the district of Ollantaytambo, province of Urubamba, in southern Per about 90 kms. northwest of the city of Cuzco).
Lisbeth is 26, single and works as an official tour guide with different travel agents that are internationally and nationally prestigious. She has had this job for four years and doing well in it. Lisbeth and her mother, Lidia, have a small family business selling sodas, water, sweets and other goods at the train station in the city of Ollantaytambo. Lisbeth is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise such as soda, water and other items.
She is a member of the communal bank "Siempre Adelante" which is comprised of 12 members who live and work in the city of Ollantaytambo.

loan.use: To buy merchandise such as soda, water and other goods.

loan.name: Muchachas Emprendedoras Group

texts.es: Es el primer ciclo del banco de emprendimiento Muchachas Emprendedoras, la presidenta es la Sra. Nelly trabaja con una tienda que esta instalada en su casa donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad, el crdito solicita para comprar mercadera de temporada ya que necesita productos como refrescos, galletas panetones y roscas navideas, ya que esta poca incrementa su mercadera, tiene dos hijos que estn en colegio, ella esta separada del esposo la casa donde vive esta en construccin y trabaja bastante para poderla terminar y brindar mayor comodidad a su hijos, La Sra. Nelly es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora ya que se esfuerza por sus hijos que dice la Sra. son su mejor tesoro, La Sra. Nelly se siente feliz y agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan en la otorgacin del crdito.
texts.en: This is the first loan cycle for the community bank "Muchachas Emprendedoras" (Enterprising Women). The president is Mrs Nelly. She works at a store located in her home, where she sell basic needs products. She is requesting the loan to purchase seasonal items, as she needs products such as beverages, crackers, cakes, Christmas rolls. This season her merchandise needs increase. She has two children that are in school. She is separated from her husband. The house in which she lives is under construction and she is working very hard to be able to finish it and provide more comfort to her children. Mrs. Nelly is a hard working and go-getting woman that strives very hard for her children who are,as she says, her best treasure. Mrs. Nelly is happy and grateful for the opportunity that this loan will bring to her.

loan.use: to purchase beverages, crackers and cakes to supply her store.

loan.name: Celia Jenny

texts.es:
Celia Jenny tiene 42 aos de estado civil Viuda, vive con el pap y con su hijo, de catorce aos. Vive en el Cantn Ventanas provincia los Ros.
La ventanilla EL RECREO se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz, arroz frjol y soya.
Jenny se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, frjol, arroz desde hace tres aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de abono, urea, lquidos fertilizantes para la siembra del maz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia y para invertir. Su sueo es superarse y darle un mejor futuro hijo en el estudio.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a pescar y estar unida con la familia.
texts.en:
Celia Jenny is 42 years old, a widow, living with her father and her 14 year old son. She lives in the Ventanas canton of the Rios province.
The service point El Recreo is located in the San Vicente Las Lomas area, belonging to the Ventanas canton. This service point is dedicated to short cycle farming such as growing corn, rice, beans and soy beans.
Jenny has been making a living growing corn, beans and rice for the last three years. She buys her products in Ventanas and sells her production in the same place.
The requested loan is for the purchase of fertilizers for the sowing of corn. The loan helps her to increase her income for the support of her family and for investment. Her dream is to improve herself and provide a better future for her son in his schooling.
In her free time she likes to fish and be with her family.

loan.use: to purchase various fertilizers for her corn crop.

loan.name: Elsa

texts.es:
Elsa naci en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo (Sitio arqueolgico incaico, capital del Distrito de Ollantaytambo (Provincia de Urubamba), situado al sur del Per, a unos 90 km al noroeste de la ciudad del Cuzco.).
Elsa tiene 71 aos edad y es soltera, ella es jubilada y trabaja brindando servicio de hospedaje y alimentacin a extranjeros que viene al Per para hacer voluntariado. Ya son varios aos que brinda el servicio y le va muy bien. Elsa tambin ayuda a su sobrina que tiene un pequeo negocio de venta de comida a pedido del cliente. En esta oportunidad Elsa requiere el prstamo para hacer mantenimiento de la casa y para comprar cosas que faltan como por ejemplo toallas y otras cosas ms. .
Elsa es integrante del grupo Siempre Adelante lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo y donde realizan sus actividades econmicas.
texts.en:
Elsa was born in the city of Ollantaytambo ( an archeological Inca site, capital of the Ollantaytambo district (Urubamba province), located in the southern part of Peru, about 90km northeast of the city of Cuzco).
Elsa is 71 years old and single. She is retired and works at providing lodging for foreigners that come to Peru to volunteer. She has been providing this service for various years and is doing well. She also helps her niece who has a small business of selling food made to order. At this time, Elsa needs the loan to be able to do maintenance on her house and buy items that she needs such as towels and other items.
She is a member of the "Siempre Adelante" (Always Ahead) group, which is made up of 12 members that live in the city of Ollantaytambo and perform their financial activities there.

loan.use: to do maintenance on her house and purchase supplies.

loan.name: Freddy Gilbert

texts.es:
Freddy Gilpert tiene 40 aos vive en unin libre, y vive con su hijo, de 9 aos. Vive en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla el recreo se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz, frjol y soya. Freddy se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace siete aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de insumos, abonos, urea, semillas para la siembra de maz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueo es comprar un carro.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a pasear y conversar con su hijo.
texts.en:
Freddy Gilpert is 40 years old, lives with his wife and son of 9 years of age. They live in the San Vicente las Lomas area of the Ventanas canton.
The V.C.R. El Recreo is located in San Vicente las Lomas, part of the Ventanas canton. The members are farmers growing corn, rice, beans and soy beans.
Freddy is a farmer and has been growing corn for seven years. He buys his products in Ventanas and sells his crop at the market of the same location.
The requested loan is for the purchase of supplies, fertilizers and seed for the planting of corn. The loan helps him to bring more income for the use of his family. His dream is to buy a car.
In his free time he likes to go for a walk and to converse with his son.

loan.use: to purchase supplies, fertilizers and seed for the planting of corn.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase more cases of beer and sodas.

loan.name: Valentina

texts.es:
Valentina naci en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo (Sitio arqueolgico incaico, capital del Distrito de Ollantaytambo (Provincia de Urubamba), situado al sur del Per, a unos 90 km al noroeste de la ciudad del Cuzco.).
Valentina tiene 48 aos edad y es casada y fruto de esta unin tiene tres hijos, ella vive en la ciudad de Aguas Calientes y donde realiza sus actividades econmicas, ella vende en el mercado de artesanos diferentes tipo de artesana como por bolsos, chompas de alpacas y otras cosas ms. Ya son 14 aos que se dedica a la venta de artesana y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo.
En esta oportunidad Valentina requiere el prstamo para comprar ms mercadera como por ejemplo chompas de lana de alpaca, maletas y otras cosas.
Valentina es integrante del grupo Siempre Adelante lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo y donde realizan sus actividades econmicas.
texts.en:
Valentina was born in the city of Ollantaytambo (an Inca archeological site, capital of the district of Ollantaytambo, province of Urubamba, situated in the south of Peru some 90 kilometers northwest of the city of Cusco).
Valentina is 48 years old and married, with three children as a result of this relationship. She lives in the city of Aguas Calientes where she carries out her work. She sells different types of arts and crafts in the artisan market, such as bags, alpaca sweaters, and other things. It has already been 14 years that she has been selling handicrafts and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.
This time Valentina needs the loan to buy more merchandise such as, for example, alpaca sweaters, briefcases, and other things.
Valentina is a member of the Siempre Adelante group made up of 12 members who live in the city of Ollantaytambo, where they carry out their economic activities.

loan.use: to buy handicrafts such as bags, alpaca sweaters, and other things.

loan.name: Teofilo

texts.es:
Teofilo naci en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo (Sitio arqueolgico incaico, capital del Distrito de Ollantaytambo (Provincia de Urubamba), situado al sur del Per, a unos 90 km al noroeste de la ciudad del Cuzco.).
Teofilo tiene 34 aos edad y tiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene un hijo, l vive en la comunidad de Tanccar y donde realiza sus actividades econmicas, l se dedica a la compra, venta y crianza de ganado. Ya son varios aos que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo.
En esta oportunidad Teofilo requiere el prstamo para comprar un torito que cuesta S/. 1, 000 nuevos soles y despus lo engorda y lo vende S/. 2,000 nuevos soles.
Teofilo es integrante del grupo Siempre Adelante lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo y donde realizan sus actividades econmicas.
texts.en:
Teofilo was born in the city of Ollantaytambo (an Inca archeological site, capital of the district of Ollantaytambo, province of Urubamba, situated in the south of Peru some 90 kilometers northwest of the city of Cusco).
Teofilo is 34 years old and has one child from a common-law relationship. He lives in the community of Tanccar where he works buying, selling, and raising livestock. He has been doing this work for several years now and it is going very well for him thanks to the effort he puts into his work.
This time Teofilo needs the loan to buy a young bull that costs 1,000 PEN, which later he will fatten and sell for 2,000 PEN.
Teofilo is a member of the Siempre Adelante group made up of 12 members who live in the city of Ollantaytambo where they carry out their economic activities.

loan.use: to buy a young bull.

loan.name: Mariuxi Yesenia

texts.es:
Mariuxi Yesenia tiene 30 aos vive en unin libre, y vive con su cnyuge y su hijo, de 9 aos. Vive en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla el recreo se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz, frjol y soya.
Mariuxi se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz desde hace siete aos. Compra y vende los roductos en Ventanas.
El crdito solicito para la compra de insumos, insecticidas, urea, abonos, lquidos para la siembra del maz. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueo es poder gozar de una buena salud y as poder estar unidos con la familia.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a pasear y jugar ftbol con su hija.
texts.en:
Mariuxi Yesenia, 30, lives with her common-law partner and her 9-year-old son. She lives in the San Vicente Las Lomas sector in Ventanas canton. El Recreo Communal Bank is located in the San Vicente Las Lomas sector of Ventanas canton. This bank is involved in short-cycle agricultural work growing corn, rice, beans, and soy.
Mariuxi has worked for seven years in agriculture growing corn. She buys her products in Ventanas and sells them in Ventanas.
She requested the loan to buy supplies, insecticide, urea, manure, and liquid fertilizer to grow corn. The loan has helped her increase her income for her family's use. Her dream is to be able to enjoy good health and so be able to be close to her family.
In her free time she likes to go out for walks and play soccer with her daughter.

loan.use: to buy supplies, insecticide, urea, manure, and liquid fertilizer to grow corn.

loan.name: Ariel Guillermo

texts.es: El seor Ariel es soltero vive en casa familiar de la ciudad de La Paz, es artesano y realiza rosones para eventos sociales y cumpleaos y para regalos. El prstamo para capitalizarse en su negocio comprando variedad de cintas para la elaboracin de rosones para regalos ya que estas fiestas de fin de ao es donde mas venta tiene, por la variedad de acontecimientos sociales, Ariel tiene 19 aos y tiene ganas de emprender su propio negocio y desea abrir una tienda ya que el es productor de rosones y desea poder exponer sus productos, sin embargo al momento solo distribuye a sus clientes fijos segn a pedidos, tiene experiencia en el negocio durante 5 aos, el es un joven muy entusiasta y trabajador con ganas de superacin y se siente agradecido con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mr. Ariel is single and lives with his family in the city of La Paz. He is an artisan and makes bows for social events, birthdays and gifts. The loan is to be used as working capital to buy different kinds of ribbon to make gift bows, since the holiday season is the time of year when he has the highest sales volume because of the social events.
Ariel is 19 and determined to start his own business and open a shop where he can display his products. For the time being he only distributes to his customers on an order basis. This has been his source of income for five years. He is an enthusiastic, hard-working young man who is determined to get ahead. He is grateful to the institution for the support.

loan.use: To buy different kinds of ribbon to make bows.

loan.name: Gladys Birmania

texts.es:
Gladys Birmania tiene 39 aos vive es casada, y vive con su cnyuge, un primo, y sus dos hijos, de 18 y 11 aos. Vive en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla el recreo se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz, frjol y soya.
Gladys se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, frjol, criar gallinas as tambin se dedica a el negocio de un bar. De confitera vveres desde hace cuatro aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, semillas, urea y abonos para poder sembrar maz, as tambin para la compra de vveres y confitera para su bar. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueo es poder gozar de una buena salud y as poder estar unidos con la familia. En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a pasear y jugar ftbol con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gladys Birmania, 39, is married and lives with her husband, a cousin and her two children, ages 18 and 11. She lives in the San Vicente Las Lomas rural community in the Ventanas Canton.
The communal bank "El Recreo" is located in San Vicente Las Lomas and the group members are involved in short cycle crop farming of corn, rice, beans and soy.
Gladys grows corn and beans and raises chickens. She also runs a bar and sells confectionery and food products, which she has been doing for four years. She buys products in Ventanas and sells at the local market there. The loan will be used to buy supplies, fertilizer, seeds, urea and compost for her corn crop, also to buy goods and confectionery for her bar. The loan will help increase her income to support the family. Her goal is to have good health and be able to be close to her family.
In her free time she enjoys going for walks and playing soccer with her children.

loan.use: To buy supplies, fertilizer, seeds, urea and compost for her corn crop.

loan.name: Cinthia Katerine

texts.es:
Cinthia naci en la ciudad de Lima pero vive en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo (La ciudad es un sitio arqueolgico incaico, capital del Distrito de Ollantaytambo (Provincia de Urubamba), situado al sur del Per, a unos 90 km al noroeste de la ciudad del Cuzco.).
Cinthia tiene 23 aos edad y es soltera, ella tiene un pequeo negocio familiar que consiste en la venta de dulces, gaseosas, agua mineral, artesana y otras cosas ms, ella tiene un puesto de venta en la calle principal donde se encuentra la estacin de trenes que se dirigen a la ciudadela de Machupicchu. Ya son varios aos que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo.
En esta oportunidad Cinthia requiere el prstamo para comprar artesana como por ejemplo chompas de lana de alpaca, sombreros, mochilas, carteras y otras cosas ms.
Cinthia es integrante del grupo Siempre Adelante lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo y donde realizan sus actividades econmicas.
texts.en:
Cinthia was born in the city of Lima but lives in Ollantaytambo (an Inca archaeological site and capital of the district of Ollantaytambo, province of Urubamba, in the south of Per, about 90 kms. northwest of the city of Cuzco).
Cinthia is 23, single and runs a small family business which consists of selling sweets, sodas, mineral water, crafts and other items. She has a stand on the main street where the train station for trains to Machupicchu is located. She has been in the business for several years now and it is going very well because of her hard work.
Cinthia is requesting a loan to buy crafts such as alpaca wool sweaters, hats, backpacks, satchels and other items. She is a member of the communal bank "Siempre Adelante" which is comprised of 12 members who live in Ollantaytambo and have different business activities.

loan.use: To buy crafts such as alpaca wool sweaters, hats, backpacks, satchels and other items.

loan.name: Kelly

texts.es: Kelly, de 20 aos, es una mujer buena, amable y muy trabajadora, es soltera y no tiene hijos ya que desea primero poder formarse profesionalmente y luego tener un hijo. Vive en casa de sus padres en donde todos los das comparte con ellos la alegra de estar juntos y trabajar para poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Kelly consiste en la venta de comida, todos los das sale a la vereda de su casa por las maanas para as vender sus jugos y sandwich, despus por las tardes vende men ya que tiene muchos clientes que se van a su establecimiento y reciben un trato amable, buena sazn y alimentos de calidad. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 3 aos y empez siendo ayudante de su madre quien ahora le dio el control total del negocio ya que desea descansar, es por eso que ella ahora trabaja mucho ya que adems de todo esto estudia y tiene que darse tiempo y sobre todo tener los ingresos para poder realizar ambas cosas. Le gusta mucho lo que hace ya que aparte de brindarle un tiempo disponible, tambin le genera muy buena ganancias, antes de poder realizar este trabajo tena problemas con el pago de su mensualidad en el instituto en donde estudia, pero ahora esta mas tranquila ya que tiene un respaldo econmico. Le gustara mucho poder ampliar su negocio y colocar mesas, sillas e implementar con utensilios que le faltan. Este ser el crdito nmero 4 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendr un apoyo financiero, ya que as se sentir segura de avanzar con su negocio. Ella por su parte se compromete una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual, as como lo hizo en sus crditos anteriores. Con el monto solicitado 1200 soles, comprar ingredientes e insumos para poder seguir realizando su trabajo, adems implementarlo y as poder brindar una mejor atencin.
texts.en:
Kelly, 20, is a good-hearted, kind and hard-working woman who is single and has no children. She wants to receive professional training before having children. She lives with her parents and enjoys being close to them while working to give them a better quality of life.
Kelly's work consists of selling food off the front porch in the morning. She sells juices and sandwiches and in the afternoon menu items, since she has many customers who go to her establishment because of her attentiveness, quality food and delicious dishes. She has been in business for three years and started with the help of her mother who has now turned over the control because she wants to retire. In addition to working hard, Kelly also studies so she needs an income to be able to do both things.
She enjoys her work because it allows her to have time off but also generates a good income. Before she started the business she had problems paying the monthly fee at the institute where she studies, but now she feel relieved that she has economic support. Her goal is to expand her business and set up tables and chairs and buy the utensils she needs. This is her fourth loan through MFP and she is very content knowing she can count on the financial support which makes her more confident that her business will advance.
She is committed to paying the loan on time as with the previous loans. She plans to use the 1,200 PEN loan to buy ingredients and supplies to continue with her work and provide better customer service.

loan.use: To buy ingredients and supplies for her food business.

loan.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy naci en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo (La ciudad es un sitio arqueolgico incaico, capital del Distrito de Ollantaytambo (Provincia de Urubamba), situado al sur del Per, a unos 90 km al noroeste de la ciudad del Cuzco.).
Nancy tiene 28 aos edad y es soltera, ella estudio la carrera tcnica de computacin e informtica en un instituto de la ciudad del Cusco, ella trabaja en un restaurante turstico en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo, ella trabaj en el restaurante como recepcionista pero por su desempeo laboral ahora la accedieron a administradora del local. Ya son tres aos que se trabaja y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su labor. Nancy y su mama tienen un pequeo negocio familiar de venta de bebidas alcohlicas sea tienen un bar. En esta oportunidad Nancy requiere el prstamo para implementar su bar sea desea comprar vasos, sillas, jarras y otras cosas ms.
Nancy es integrante del grupo Siempre Adelante lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo y donde realizan sus actividades econmicas.
texts.en:
Nancy was born in the city of Ollantaytambo, an Incan archaeological site and the capital of the District of Ollantaytambo, Urubamba Province, in southern Peru, some 90km northeast of the city of Cusco.
She is twenty-eight-years-old and single. She went to school at an institute in Cusco for computer and information technologies. She worked as a hostess in a tourist restaurant in Ollantaytambo but due to her job performance they made her the manager. She's been working for three years and it's going very well thanks to the effort she puts into the job. She and her mother have a small family business, a bar, where they sell alcoholic drinks. Nancy needs a loan at this time to buy items for the bar, including glasses, chairs, pitchers, etc.
Nancy belongs to the "Siempre Adelante" [Always Forward] Group, which has twelve members that live and have businesses in Ollantaytambo.

loan.use: to buy glasses, chairs, pitchers, and other items.

loan.name: Albeiro Antonio

texts.es: A sus 51 aos, el seor Albeiro luego de quedarse sin empleo hace tres aos, inicio a trabajar como reciclador en el municipio de el Carmen de Viboral localizado al oriente de Antioquia, desde entonces almacena en una bodega ubicada en la parte trasera de su casa los materiales que recoge y cada que tiene una cantidad bastante grande la vende a chatarreras del Carmen de Viboral y Rionegro. Debido a un accidente que sufri el seor Albeiro meses atrs se encuentra con poco capital de trabajo y an sufre algunas molestias fsicas, es por esto que tiene la esperanza de comprar material reciclado para recuperar un poco su negocio, el cual le brinda los ingresos mnimos para el sustento familiar.
texts.en:
At 51 years old, after being unemployed for three years, Albeiro began working as a recycler in the town of El Carmen de Viboral, located to the east of Antioquia. He stores the materials that he collects in a small storage facility behind his house, and every time he has enough materials, he sells them to junkyards in El Carmen de Viboral and Rionegro.
Due to an accident that Albeiro suffered some months back, he finds himself with little working capital and still suffers from some physical problems. As a result, he hopes to buy some recycled materials to allow his business to recover, which will provide the minimum income to support his family.

loan.use: To purchase material to recycle.

loan.name: Irma Jeaneth

texts.es:
Irma Janeth tiene 34 aos vive en Unin Libre, y vive con su cnyuge y su hija, de 9 aos. Vive en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla el recreo se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz, frjol y soya. Irma se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, frjol, a criar gallinas chanchas. Desde hace cuatro aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de insumos, urea, fertilizante, abonos, insecticidas para la siembra del maz, as tambin para la compra de la comida apropiada para criar sus gallinas y chanchos. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueo es poder comprar un carro para poder movilizarse en el negocio y as poder gozar de buena salud y estar unidos con la familia.
En los tiempos pasar ms juntos con la familia y con su hija.
texts.en:
Irma Janeth, 34, lives with her partner and 9-year old daughter in San Vicente Las Lomas, a small town in the Ecuadorean canton of Ventanas.
The members of the El Recreo community bank in San Vicente Las Lomas make their livings from farming. They grow maize, rice, beans and soy. Irma, too, is a farmer. She grows maize and beans and raises chickens and pigs. She started the business four years ago. She buys and sells what she needs in Ventanas.
Irma will use part of this loan to buy urea, fertilizer, manure, pesticides and other supplies for growing maize. She will use the rest to feed for her chickens and pigs. Borrowing helps her increase her family's income. Irma's goal is to buy a cart for transporting goods to market.
In her spare time, Irma likes to spend time with her family and her daughter.

loan.use: to buy supplies for farming businesses.

loan.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es: La seora Maria Guadalupe esta solicitando un prstamo para poder pagar la diferencia de una casa por medio de un crdito Infonavit (Crdito Gubernamental). Ya que actualmente donde esta viviendo esta pagando renta, ya le subieron el pago y es muy difcil para ella pagar esa cantidad, pero decidi mejor pagar su propio patrimonio y que en algn futuro ser para su hija y nietos. Doa Maria Guadalupe trabaja como asistente de un consultorio medico desde hace ya mas de 5 aos y con este ingreso a salido adelante y pudo darle estudios a su hija, ya que esta divorciada. Solicita este prstamo y a si adquirir su vivienda, espera contar con su cooperacin.
texts.en: Sra. Maria Guadalupe is applying for a loan to pay the difference [between the cost of a house she is buying and the amount of a loan] from Infonavit (a government credit program). She is renting a place now, but her rent is increasing and she's finding it difficult to keep up. Consequently, she's decided that it would be better to own her own house, a place for her daughter and grandchildren one day. Dona Maria Guadalupe works as an assistant for a medical practice. She has worked there for 5 years and her income from the job has allowed her to support herself and to send her now-divorced daughter to school. She wants to use this loan to buy the house and she's counting on your support.

loan.use: to buy a house.

loan.name: Milton Jacinto

texts.es:
Milton Jacinto tiene 31 aos vive en Unin Libre, y vive con su cnyuge y sus hijos de 4, 20, 18, 17,9 aos. Vive en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla el recreo se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz, frjol y soya.
Milton se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, frjol, a criar ganado. Desde hace cinco aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de semillas, insumos, fertilizantes, urea para la siembra del maz, as tambin para la compra de la comida apropiada para criar sus ganados. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueo es poder comprar una finca y as poder gozar de buena salud y estar unidos con la familia.
En los tiempos libres me gusta jugar indor, pasar con su familia.
texts.en:
Milton Jacinto, 31, lives with his partner and their children in San Vicente Las Lomas, a small town in the Ecuadorean canton of Ventanas.
The members of the El Recreo community bank in San Vicente Las Lomas make their livings from farming. They grow maize, rice, beans and soy.
Milton, too, is a farmer. He grows maize and beans and raises cattle. He started the business five years ago. She buys and sells what she needs in Ventanas.
Milton will use part of this loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea and other supplies for growing maize. He will use the rest to buy feed for his cattle business. Borrowing helps him increase his family's income. Milton's goals are to buy a farm, stay healthy and keep his family together.
In his spare time, Milton likes to play "indor"--don't know--and spend time with his family.

loan.use: to buy supplies for his farming business.

loan.name: Apolinar

texts.es:
Apolinar naci en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo (La ciudad es un sitio arqueolgico incaico, capital del Distrito de Ollantaytambo (Provincia de Urubamba), situado al sur del Per, a unos 90 km al noroeste de la ciudad del Cuzco.).
Apolinar tiene 53 aos edad y es casado, l se dedica a la elaboracin de artesana y tiene un pequeo taller en la ciudad de Machupicchu, l elaborar diferentes tipos de artesana pero en especial mochilas, chompas, mantones, maletines y otras cosas ms. Ya son 15 aos que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeo que pone en su trabajo. Apolinar requiere el prstamo para comprar una maquina remalladora. Su sueo de Apolinar es abrir una empresa formal con su propia marca y poder distribuir en el extranjero.
Apolinar es integrante del grupo Siempre Adelante lo conforman 12 socios que viven en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo y donde realizan sus actividades econmicas.
texts.en:
Apolinar was born in the city of Ollantaytambo, an Incan achaeological site and the capital of the district of Ollantaytambo in Urubamba Province in southestern Peru, around 90km northeast of the city of Cusco.
He is fifty-three and married. He earns his living making handicrafts and has a small workshop in the city of Machupicchu. He makes a variety of handicrafts, including shoulder bags, sweaters, shawls, handbags, etc. He's been in business for fifteen years and it's going very well thanks to the effort he puts into it. Apolinar currently needs a loan to buy a sewing machine. His dream is to open an official company, with his own brand, so he can distribute internationally.
Apolinar belongs to the "Siempre Adelante" [Always Forward] group, which has twelve members that live and run their businesses in the city of Ollantaytambo.

loan.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loan.name: Esmeralda De Cosmos Group

texts.es:
La A.C. ESMERAL DE COSMOS iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Cascada, est compuesta por seis integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la seora Nanddy es secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Confeccin de mantas, venta de frutas, fotocopiadora, trenzado de matas, tejido de mantas a mquina, albailera.
La seora Nanddy, indica que hace cinco meses trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institucin por invitacin de una amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de trenzado de mantas que viene trabajando hace aos.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de lana) que comprara de la feria 16 de julio y posteriormente a la elaboracin lo vender a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene dos hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la atencin y el buen humor.
En la fotografa acompaa la hermana de la seora Esperanza, ella se encuentra vestida con un chaleco rojo sentada
texts.en:
The Esmeral de Cosmos Communal Bank will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Cascada Regional Hub. It is made up of six members and it is led by a board of directors in which Nanddy is the secretary. The members of the communal bank work in different fields, such as knitting blankets, selling fruit, making photocopies, weaving blankets, machine-sewing blankets, and building.
Nanddy tells us she has been with Pro Mujer for five months now and that she joined the institution after being invited by a friend. She currently has a business weaving blankets that she has had for years.
The loan she is currently taking out is to increase her capital to buy wool at the July 16th Fair that commemorates the founding of La Paz. After making her blankets she will sell them as they are ordered.
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she tells us that she likes the attention and the positive atmosphere.
In the photograph, provided by Esperanza's sister, she is seated, wearing a red vest.

loan.use: to buy blankets

loan.name: Felipe Francisco

texts.es:
Felipe Francisco tiene 46 aos vive en Unin Libre, y vive con su cnyuge y con los hijos. Vive en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas en el Cantn Ventanas.
La ventanilla el recreo se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Vicente las Lomas, perteneciente al cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembre de maz y arroz, frjol y soya criar gallinas.
Felipe se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maz, frjol, a criar gallinas. Desde hace ocho aos. Compra sus productos en Ventanas y las vende en el mercado del mismo lugar.
El crdito solicito para la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, urea, lquidos para la maleza para la siembra del maz, as tambin para la compra de la comida apropiada para criar sus gallinas. El prstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. Su sueo es poder comprar un terreno y as poder tener mayor ingresos para su familia.
En los tiempos libres me gusta jugar indor, pasar con su familia.
texts.en:
Felipe Francisco is 46 years old and lives with his spouse and his children. He lives in the San Vicente las Lomas area of the Ventanas canton.
The V.C.R. El Recreo is in San Vicente las Lomas, part of the Ventanas canton, and is composed of members dedicated to farming corn, rice, beans and soy beans and the raising of chickens.
Felipe grows corn and beans and raises chickens, he has been doing this for eight years. He buys his products in Ventanas and sells his production in the market of the same location.
The requested loan is for the purchase of supplies, fertilizers, weed killers for the planting of corn. He is also buying feed for his chickens. The loan helps him to increase his income for the use of his family. His dream is to buy land and be able to generate more income for his family.
In his free time he likes to be with his family.

loan.use: to purchase supplies, fertilizers, weed killers for the planting of corn, and also to buy feed for the chickens.

loan.name: Margarita's Group

texts.es:
Margarita's group es un grupo de tres mujeres responsables por sus familias y trabajo, en este grupo la presidenta es Margarita ya que es una mujer fuerte, muy luchadora, proactiva, amable adems le gusta mejorar cada da su estilo de vida. Margarita es madre de familia, vive con su esposo y cuatro hijos en la ciudad de Cayambe que se encuentra a media hora de Otavalo.
Margarita tiene una tienda, en la cual trabaja su familia ya que es la nica fuente de ingreso de su familia para sustentar sus gastos. Es la primera vez que realiza un crpedito en Fodemi, este crdito va a ser invertido en la compra de productos variados para su tienda ya que en la temporada de navidad incrementan las ventas y los ingresos es por eso que quiere qprovechar ya que directamente beneficiar a su familia mejorando su calidad de vida.
El sueo de Margarita es poder exportar productos y que sus hijos aprendan del negocio ya que les puede generar buenas utilidades.
texts.en:
Margarita's Group is a group of three women responsible for their families and work. Margarita is the president of this group because she is a strong woman, very much a fighter, proactive, kind. She also likes to improve her lifestyle every day. Margarita is the mother of a family. She lives with her husband and four children in the city of Cayambe, which is located a half hour from Otavalo.
Margarita has a store in which her family works because it is the only source of family income to support their expenses. This is the first time she is getting a loan from FODEMI. This loan will be invested in buying various products for her store because during the Christmas season sales and income go up. This is why she wants to take advantage, because it will directly benefit her family, improving their quality of life.
Margarita's dream is to be able to export products and for her children to learn the business since it can generate good profits for them.

loan.use: to supply her store with various products to get good Christmas sales.
